original: de lta ma yin pa mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin pa mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is not seen in that way is possible.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is clarified by “this.”

original: 'on kyang ma bzung ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang ma bzung ba nyid yin no //
translated: But it is not apprehended.

original: gang phyir de lta yin pa des na 'di ni mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: gang phyir de lta yin pa des na 'di ni mthong ba yin no //
translated: Since that is so, this is the perception.

original: zhes bya ba'i dran pa tshad mar grub po zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i dran pa tshad mar grub po zhes 'brel to //
translated: Thus, the memory is established as valid cognition.

original: ci'i phyir zhes dogs na bshad zin pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni ma bzung ba nyid de /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes dogs na bshad zin pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni ma bzung ba nyid de /
translated: If one wonders why, the explanation is to clarify what has already been said: it is not apprehended.

original: gzhan du gyur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is transformed.

original: du ba'i rtags las skyes pa'i tshad ma yang mngon sum ma yin na rjes su dpag pa kho na yin gyi khyad par mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: du ba'i rtags las skyes pa'i tshad ma yang mngon sum ma yin na rjes su dpag pa kho na yin gyi khyad par mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: The valid cognition that arises from the sign of smoke is also not perception, but rather is inference alone. It is not seeing a specific instance, that is the idea.

original: gang gi rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba rjes su rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur bar srid snyam na /
analyzed: gang gi rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba rjes su rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur bar srid snyam na /
translated: If one wonders how it could be inference, since it is impossible for it to be transformed in another way,

original: mngon sum gyis ni zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni zhes gsungs so /
translated: it is said, “by perception.”🔽If it were not so,

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni rang gi dus kyi mthar thug pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni rang gi dus kyi mthar thug pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin na'o //
translated: it would not apprehend its nature that is limited to its own time.

original: 'chi ba'i mtha' dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i mtha' dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It has the limit of death.🔽At that very time,

original: de nyid kyi tshe na zhes bya ba ni 'tshi  mtha' 'dzin dus kyi de ma thag pa'i dus @154b nyid du'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe na zhes bya ba ni 'tshi  mtha' 'dzin dus kyi de ma thag pa'i dus @154b nyid du'o //
translated: immediately at the time of apprehending the limit of death.

original: de la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de la yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not even that.

original: dus ni rang gi dus kyi mthar thug pa'i rang bzhi nyid mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: dus ni rang gi dus kyi mthar thug pa'i rang bzhi nyid mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Time is directly perceived in its own nature, which is ultimate.

original: des na 'di na ma mthong ba nyid yin no snyam pa'i dran pa ni mthong ba yin par mi 'thad do zhes gnas so //
analyzed: des na 'di na ma mthong ba nyid yin no snyam pa'i dran pa ni mthong ba yin par mi 'thad do zhes gnas so //
translated: Therefore, the memory that thinks “I did not see it here” is not tenable as a seeing.

original: 'on te 'di yang /🔽khyad par yul can nyid kyang min //
analyzed: 'on te 'di yang / khyad par yul can nyid kyang min //
translated: But if this is said

original: zhes bya ba 'dis don brjod pa'i phyir yang zlos pa'i don yin zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis don brjod pa'i phyir yang zlos pa'i don yin zhe na /
translated: because the meaning is stated by this [line], “It is not a subject of distinction,”🔽then it is a repetition.

original: nyes pa lhag par brjod pa'i don to /
analyzed: nyes pa lhag par brjod pa'i don to /
translated: The meaning is to state an additional fault.

original: de nyid brjod pa'i don du gzhan dag dgos par byed pa ni rjes su dpag pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste rgyun gyi rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa'i don du gzhan dag dgos par byed pa ni rjes su dpag pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste rgyun gyi rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Others make the purpose of stating that very [fault] to be inference, because of the statement, “By the engagement of the continuum.”

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: Where is this stated?

original: mngon sum ring pos zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mngon sum ring pos zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is stated by “Direct perception is distant.”

original: gal te de lta na yang 'chi ba'i mtha' dang bcas par 'dzin par thal ba las ji ltar thar snyam na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang 'chi ba'i mtha' dang bcas par 'dzin par thal ba las ji ltar thar snyam na /
translated: But if it is like that, how is it that one is not liberated from the consequence of apprehending that which has the end of death?

original: ring min pas na zhes smras so //
analyzed: ring min pas na zhes smras so //
translated: It is said, “Because it is not distant.”

original: de ltar na ci 'grub snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar na ci 'grub snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is established in that way,

original: de nyid kyi tshe na zhes smras so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe na zhes smras so //
translated: then at that time, it is said.

original: de lta na yang nyes pa gzhan yod do zhes brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang nyes pa gzhan yod do zhes brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even so, there is another fault, which is stated by “If . . . .”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan khyab pa 'dzin pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan khyab pa 'dzin pas na'o //
translated: “Then” means that the other time is pervaded.

original: ci ste zhes bya bas don dam par mthong ba'i yul can ma yin pa'i ma yin pa'i yul can yin zhes bya ba'i dogs pa bsu nas 'di la brjod pa zhes bya bas sel bar byed do //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya bas don dam par mthong ba'i yul can ma yin pa'i ma yin pa'i yul can yin zhes bya ba'i dogs pa bsu nas 'di la brjod pa zhes bya bas sel bar byed do //
translated: If you think that it is not the case that the object of seeing is ultimately the object of non-seeing, then the response to that is stated by “In this regard . . . .”

original: de la zhes bya ba ni skyes pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni skyes pa la'o //
translated: “In that” refers to the arising.

original: de'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni mngon mthong ba'i dngos por grub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni mngon mthong ba'i dngos por grub pa'o //
translated: “Its state” is the state of seeing.

original: tshad mas zhes bya ba ni mngon mthong bas so //
analyzed: tshad mas zhes bya ba ni mngon mthong bas so //
translated: “By valid knowledge” is by seeing.

original: de'i tshe dngos po gzhan la ste ma mthong ba la mthong ba de nyid sgro 'dogs pa'i ni 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe dngos po gzhan la ste ma mthong ba la mthong ba de nyid sgro 'dogs pa'i ni 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, it is a mistake to superimpose seeing on another thing, that is, on what is not seen.

original: mngon sum gyis grub pa nyid khyad par mthong bas grub pa yin na gzung ba'i 'dzin phyir tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do zhes brjod pa ni de grub ces bya ba'o //🔽re zhig rtsod pa'i cha nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis grub pa nyid khyad par mthong bas grub pa yin na gzung ba'i 'dzin phyir tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do zhes brjod pa ni de grub ces bya ba'o // re zhig rtsod pa'i cha nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is established by perception, since it is established by seeing a difference, it is not a valid cognition because of apprehending what is already apprehended.

original: gzhan min zhes bya ba ni gzhan kho na'o //
analyzed: gzhan min zhes bya ba ni gzhan kho na'o //
translated: The part of the debate itself is explained: if it is said, “it is not different,” it is only different.

original: de nyid ni mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni mthong ba'o //
translated: That itself is seeing.

original: gzhan ba yang sngar gyi mngon sum bzung ba nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan ba yang sngar gyi mngon sum bzung ba nyid do zhe na /
translated: If it is said, “it is not different from what was previously apprehended by perception,”

original: sngar mthong ba de ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sngar mthong ba de ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is said, “that which was previously seen.”

original: ma bzung ba ni mngon sum gyis so //
analyzed: ma bzung ba ni mngon sum gyis so //
translated: What was not apprehended is by perception.

original: de nyid du mthong ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: de nyid du mthong ba nyid du'o //
translated: It is just that which is seen.

original: gzhan du ma mthong ba nyid du'o //🔽rjes su dpag pas ma bzung /
analyzed: gzhan du ma mthong ba nyid du'o // rjes su dpag pas ma bzung /
translated: It is not seen as different.🔽It is not apprehended by inference.

original: 'dzin pa ni ma yin te zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ni ma yin te zhes 'brel to //
translated: It is not apprehended.

original: gal te dran pa 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'brang na /
analyzed: gal te dran pa 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'brang na /
translated: If memory follows what is apprehended,

original: rjes su dpag pas ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas ji ltar zhe na /
translated: how is it by inference?

original: rjes su dpag pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, “inference is . . .”

original: ci ste rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis mthong ba nyid khyad par mthong @155a * //
analyzed: ci ste rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis mthong ba nyid khyad par mthong @155a * //
translated: But if you think that what is called inference is the seeing of a specific attribute that is not seen by direct perception,🔽

original: bas 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bas 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If you say that what is called inference is the perception of what is seen by direct perception, because it sees a difference, the meaning is that it apprehends.

original: mngon sum cig shos zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum cig shos zhes bya ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: The other direct perception is direct perception and inference.

original: gcig grub pa na zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi nang nas gcig kho na grub mdo /
analyzed: gcig grub pa na zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi nang nas gcig kho na grub mdo /
translated: When one is established, when one of the two is established,

original: gnyis kas ci zhig byed dang 'brel ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i byad pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis kas ci zhig byed dang 'brel ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i byad pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is related to the function of both, because it is related to the function of the eye, etc.

original: gang tshe snang ba yod pa de'i tshe yang 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gang tshe snang ba yod pa de'i tshe yang 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: When there is light, at that time also it is not apprehended, it is said.

original: 'o na snang ba de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na snang ba de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Well then, that light, it is said.

original: dngos po 'dzin pa nyid du dgos pa bsu nas sel ba ni snang ba dang bral ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po 'dzin pa nyid du dgos pa bsu nas sel ba ni snang ba dang bral ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having anticipated the need for the apprehension of an entity, the removal is: when separated from light, etc.

original: de ltar gyur pa na ni zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang ldan pa de dang dral bar 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa na ni zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang ldan pa de dang dral bar 'dzin pa'o //
translated: When that occurs, when it is separated from that which has light, it apprehends.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: The word just means only.

original: gal te khyad par mthong ba ma yin na 'o na da ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par mthong ba ma yin na 'o na da ci yin zhe na /
translated: If one does not see a difference, then what is it?

original: gzhan dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is another.

original: sngon mthong ba'i don dang mtshams sbyar ba'i zhen pa nges pa ste rigs pa zhes pas dran pa yin par shes kyi tshad mas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon mthong ba'i don dang mtshams sbyar ba'i zhen pa nges pa ste rigs pa zhes pas dran pa yin par shes kyi tshad mas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is memory that is connected with the object seen before, and is called certainty or reason, not valid cognition.

original: des na mngon sum nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na mngon sum nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, it is perception, is the meaning.

original: 'on te du ba la sogs pa la ltos nas 'gyur ba'i phyir ji ltar tshad ma ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te du ba la sogs pa la ltos nas 'gyur ba'i phyir ji ltar tshad ma ma yin zhe na /
translated: But if it is based on smoke, etc., how is it not valid cognition?

original: dogs pa bsu nas sel ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa bsu nas sel ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Anticipating this question, he answers:

original: de ni rtags la ltos pa'i phyir dran pa ni ma yin gyi //
analyzed: de ni rtags la ltos pa'i phyir dran pa ni ma yin gyi //
translated: It is not memory because it is based on a reason,

original: 'on kyang tshad ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang tshad ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but it is valid cognition.

original: dran pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dran pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not not memory,

original: 'on kyang dran pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang dran pa kho na'o //
translated: but it is memory.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na 'khrul phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na 'khrul phyir ro //
translated: Why? Because it is mistaken.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And also, is another reason.

original: mtshams ni zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams ni zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa'o //
translated: The commentary on “at the time” is “at the time of the perception of the object.”

original: rnam par dpyod par bya ba brjod pa ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dpyod par bya ba brjod pa ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of the object of analysis is “the nature of the manifest.”🔽The response is “at that time it is memory, not the perception of a difference.”🔽The clarification of this is “perception.”🔽The response to the question “How is that?” is “if it is imputed.”

original: 'di la sum 'byin pa ni de'i tshe dran pa nyid yin te khyad par mthong ba ni ma yin no//
analyzed: 'di la sum 'byin pa ni de'i tshe dran pa nyid yin te khyad par mthong ba ni ma yin no//
translated: The response to the question “How is it not?” is the commentary on the conclusion.🔽The response to the question “How is it in the case of smoke?” is “because of the absence of the trimodal conditions.”🔽The response to the question “Why is it not a reason?” is “because of the absence of the trimodal conditions.”🔽The response to the question “What is that?” is “the example.”🔽Therefore the response to the question “How is it in the case of smoke?” is “because of the absence of the trimodal conditions.”

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni mngon sum dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni mngon sum dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the question “What is that?” is “the example.”🔽Therefore the response to the question “How is it in the case of smoke?” is “because of the absence of the trimodal conditions.”

original: gal te de btags zhes bya ba rnam par 'brel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te de btags zhes bya ba rnam par 'brel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the question “What is that?” is “the example.”🔽Therefore the response to the question “How is it in the case of smoke?” is “because of the absence of the trimodal conditions.”

original: da ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: da ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' 'grel pa'o //
translated: The response to the question “What is that?” is “the example.”🔽Therefore the response to the question “How is it in the case of smoke?” is “because of the absence of the trimodal conditions.”

original: 'di las ni du ba la'o //
analyzed: 'di las ni du ba la'o //
translated: The response to the question “What is that?” is “the example.”🔽Therefore the response to the question “How is it in the case of smoke?” is “because of the absence of the trimodal conditions.”🔽The response to the question “What is that?” is “the example.”🔽Therefore the response to the question “How is it in the case of smoke?” is “because of the absence of the trimodal conditions.”

original: ci'i phyir rtags nyid med ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rtags nyid med ce na /
translated: The response to the question “What is that?” is “the example.”

original: tshul gsum pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste khyad kyi 'dod pas so //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste khyad kyi 'dod pas so //
translated: Therefore the response to the question “How is it in the case of smoke?” is “because of the absence of the trimodal conditions.”🔽The response to the question “What is that?” is “the example.”

original: de nyid ji ltar zhe na dpe dang zhes gsungs so //🔽des na du ba ni 'khrul pa yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ji ltar zhe na dpe dang zhes gsungs so //🔽des na du ba ni 'khrul pa yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore the response to the question “How is it in the case of smoke?” is “because of the absence of the tri

original: rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa'i phyir ji ltar spyi'i yul can zhan gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa'i phyir ji ltar spyi'i yul can zhan gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: Because it apprehends its own nature, how can it be the object of a universal?

original: dran par bya ni dong yi rang bzhin du lhag par gzhan par bya ba ste spyi @155b yin no //
analyzed: dran par bya ni dong yi rang bzhin du lhag par gzhan par bya ba ste spyi @155b yin no //
translated: A universal is that which is to be specially known as the nature of what is remembered.

original: gzung bar byang ma yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gzung bar byang ma yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it not apprehended?

original: gzung bar bya ba nyid du zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba nyid du zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, “because of the nature of apprehension.”

original: gal te rjes su dpag par ni dran pa ma yin pa des na de ltar ji ste brjod snyam na rjes su dpag pa ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag par ni dran pa ma yin pa des na de ltar ji ste brjod snyam na rjes su dpag pa ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: If it is not remembered, how can it be inferred? He says, “Inference is also like that.”

original: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o shes pa gang gis so //
analyzed: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o shes pa gang gis so //
translated: The summary of the topic is “Therefore, by that cognition.”

original: gal te khyad par mthong ba dngos po'i 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin ma yin na 'o na zhes sbyor ro //
analyzed: gal te khyad par mthong ba dngos po'i 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin ma yin na 'o na zhes sbyor ro //
translated: If the perception of a particular is not the nature of the apprehension of a thing, then what?

original: da ltar zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: da ltar zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The answer is “now.”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na phyogs de na zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na phyogs de na zhes gsungs so //
translated: Why? He says, “because that is not the case.”

original: gang gi phyir de ltar khyad par mthong ba spyi'i yul can yin pa de'i phyir de lta yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar khyad par mthong ba spyi'i yul can yin pa de'i phyir de lta yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is seen that way, it is a universal.

original: skabs chen po nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir gzhal bya gnyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skabs chen po nye bar sdud pa ni de'i phyir gzhal bya gnyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to summarize the great topic, it says “two objects.”

original: ji ltar tshad ma rnam par gnyis yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar tshad ma rnam par gnyis yin zhe na /
translated: How is there a twofold division of valid cognition?

original: mngon sum dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It says “perception” and so on.

original: yul rnam pa gnyis ji ltar zhe na dngos dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul rnam pa gnyis ji ltar zhe na dngos dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is there a twofold division of objects? It says “real” and so on.

original: mngon sum rtog dang bral bar ni //
analyzed: mngon sum rtog dang bral bar ni //
translated: Perception is free from conceptuality.

original: mngon sum nyid kyi grub pa yin //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid kyi grub pa yin //
translated: It is established as perception.

original: zhes bshad pa mthong ba'i phyir na bshad par bya pa'i mdo nyid 'god pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa mthong ba'i phyir na bshad par bya pa'i mdo nyid 'god pa ni /
translated: In order to explain this, the sūtra itself is cited:

original: de la mngon sum ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la mngon sum ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Here, perception” and so on.

original: de dang bral ba nyid sgrub pa'i don du rtog pa dang 'khrul pa'i rang gi ngo bo gsungs pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dang bral ba nyid sgrub pa'i don du rtog pa dang 'khrul pa'i rang gi ngo bo gsungs pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to establish that, the nature of conceptuality and error is stated: “Distinct” and so on.

original: khyad par la sogs pa dang sgra la sogs pa dang / 'brel pa 'dres pa'i don gyi rnam par gang la yod pa ste de ni rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par la sogs pa dang sgra la sogs pa dang / 'brel pa 'dres pa'i don gyi rnam par gang la yod pa ste de ni rtog pa yin no //
translated: The word “also” indicates that it is not only the conceptual cognition that is mistaken, but also the non-conceptual cognition is mistaken.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log nyid du'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log nyid du'o //
translated: “Otherwise” means “in a different way.”

original: de gnyis dang zhes bya ba ni spyir rtog pa dang 'khrul pa gnyi ga dang ngo //
analyzed: de gnyis dang zhes bya ba ni spyir rtog pa dang 'khrul pa gnyi ga dang ngo //
translated: “Those two” refers to both conceptual cognition and non-conceptual cognition.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma 'khrul te dung dkar po la ser po la sogs par shes pa 'khrul pa nyid ni mig sman la sogs pas gsal bar byas pa'i mngon sum dung dkar po mthong ba las nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma 'khrul te dung dkar po la ser po la sogs par shes pa 'khrul pa nyid ni mig sman la sogs pas gsal bar byas pa'i mngon sum dung dkar po mthong ba las nges pa yin no //
translated: “Otherwise” means “without error.” The error of the cognition of a white conch as yellow, etc. is ascertained from the direct perception of a white conch when it is clarified by collyrium, etc.

original: chos can gyi chos bstan pa'i phyir na rtog pa nyid dang / bral ba de'i dngos de nyid gang las nges yin te /
analyzed: chos can gyi chos bstan pa'i phyir na rtog pa nyid dang / bral ba de'i dngos de nyid gang las nges yin te /
translated: In order to show the property of the subject, it is said: “The cognition that is free from conceptualization and error is ascertained from that itself.”

original: 'ga' las kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'ga' las kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not ascertained from anything else.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa las nges pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa las nges pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is asked whether it is ascertained from inference,

original: de na de skad ci ste brjod snyam na /
analyzed: de na de skad ci ste brjod snyam na /
translated: why is it said that way?

original: mngon sum de med na'o //
analyzed: mngon sum de med na'o //
translated: If there were no perception.

original: 'o na mngon sum gyi rtog pa dang bral ba nyid nges pa yin /
analyzed: 'o na mngon sum gyi rtog pa dang bral ba nyid nges pa yin /
translated: But if there is certainty from the absence of the conception of perception,

original: de sngon du 'gro ba'i rjes su dpag pas kyang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de sngon du 'gro ba'i rjes su dpag pas kyang yin no zhe na /
translated: and also from inference which has that as its antecedent,

original: mngon sum mtha' dag kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum mtha' dag kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then all perception is also like that.

original: de'i yang zhes bya ba ni spyod pa la sogs pa'i yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i yang zhes bya ba ni spyod pa la sogs pa'i yang ngo //
translated: And that also means the practice, etc.

original: des ci 'gyur zhe na de zhes bya ba'o //🔽de yang ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon @156a * //
analyzed: des ci 'gyur zhe na de zhes bya ba'o // de yang ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon @156a * //
translated: What is the point of that? That also means the conception.

original: sum yang ngo //
analyzed: sum yang ngo //
translated: And that also means the conception which is associated with perception.

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa ni sha za bzhin du bltar mi rung ba'i phyir na ji ltar mngon sum gyis med pa'i tha snyad du byed snyam na kun gyi rnam rtog ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa ni sha za bzhin du bltar mi rung ba'i phyir na ji ltar mngon sum gyis med pa'i tha snyad du byed snyam na kun gyi rnam rtog ces bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that since the conception is not visible like a piece of meat, how can it be established as non-existent by perception, then all conceptions are like that.

original: ming ste dgra'i rten ni mi rten can te /
analyzed: ming ste dgra'i rten ni mi rten can te /
translated: The basis of the name is the non-basis,

original: sgra dang 'dre bar rung ba'i snang ba can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra dang 'dre bar rung ba'i snang ba can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: which means having an appearance suitable for mixing with sound.

original: rtog pa po gsal pa la ltos te ni thams cad mngon sum nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i tha snyad du byed kyi mi dmigs pas ni ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //🔽de las gzhan la ltos te ni 'ga' zhig tu mi dmigs pas yin gyi /
analyzed: rtog pa po gsal pa la ltos te ni thams cad mngon sum nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i tha snyad du byed kyi mi dmigs pas ni ma yin no zhes bshad zin to // de las gzhan la ltos te ni 'ga' zhig tu mi dmigs pas yin gyi /
translated: But in relation to the clear perceiver, all are direct perception, and the term “nonexistent” is used, not “nonapprehended.”

original: thams cad du ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad du ni ma yin gyi /
translated: In relation to something else, it is apprehended in some cases, but not in all cases.

original: dpe med par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes kyang bstan zin to //
analyzed: dpe med par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes kyang bstan zin to //
translated: Otherwise, it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no examples.

original: de'i bdag nyid dgag pa la ni khyad par dang bral ba'i mi dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dgag pa la ni khyad par dang bral ba'i mi dmigs pa yin la /
translated: In the case of the refutation of identity, it is nonapprehension devoid of distinction.

original: tha dad pa dgag pa la ni khyad par dang bcas pa nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa dgag pa la ni khyad par dang bcas pa nyid kyis yin no //
translated: In the case of the refutation of difference, it is nonapprehension with distinction.

original: shes pa gcig la 'dre ba nyid kyang 'khrul pa med par dmigs pa'i nye bar mtshon byed yin te /
analyzed: shes pa gcig la 'dre ba nyid kyang 'khrul pa med par dmigs pa'i nye bar mtshon byed yin te /
translated: The fact that they are mixed in a single cognition is the indication of their being apprehended without error.

original: nges na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang rnam par rtog pa dmigs pa pa la 'khrul pa med pa can dag las /
analyzed: nges na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang rnam par rtog pa dmigs pa pa la 'khrul pa med pa can dag las /
translated: In that case, it is either the sense consciousness or the conceptual consciousness that apprehends them without error.

original: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa gcig dmigs pa nyid dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa gcig dmigs pa nyid dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of the conceptual differentiation that has the characteristic of an object of the sense consciousnesses is the non-apprehension of the object.

original: 'dir ni rang bzhin khyad par can nyid brjod do 'chad pa ni mngon sum zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni rang bzhin khyad par can nyid brjod do 'chad pa ni mngon sum zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the special nature is stated; the explanation is “perception.”

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa dang gzhan dag lhan cig 'byung bas tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar rtog pa dang gzhan gyi rnam par byed par 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa dang gzhan dag lhan cig 'byung bas tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar rtog pa dang gzhan gyi rnam par byed par 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If conceptual differentiation and the others are not different because they occur together, how can there be the activity of conceptual differentiation and the others?

original: rnam par rtog par bya ba ni rang rig pas zhes so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog par bya ba ni rang rig pas zhes so //
translated: The object of conceptual differentiation is the self-awareness.

original: rnam par brtag par bya ba ni mi gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par brtag par bya ba ni mi gsal ba'o //
translated: The object of investigation is the unclear.

original: snang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: snang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
translated: “ Appearance” is the clear.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar nyams su myong ba des na gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i chos 'gal ba'i gnas pa na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar nyams su myong ba des na gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i chos 'gal ba'i gnas pa na'o //
translated: Since there is the experience in this way, the clear and unclear dharmas are in a state of contradiction.

original: de yod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang cig shos dag yod pas so //
analyzed: de yod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang cig shos dag yod pas so //
translated: “ Its existence” is the existence of the conceptual differentiation and the others.

original: rkyen gzhan tshogs pa dang ldan par ston pas lan brjod pa ni thams cad las ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rkyen gzhan tshogs pa dang ldan par ston pas lan brjod pa ni thams cad las ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The reply is stated by the teacher, “When all conditions are assembled,”

original: yul thams cad las rnam par rtog pa'i sems bsdus nas so //
analyzed: yul thams cad las rnam par rtog pa'i sems bsdus nas so //
translated: having withdrawn the conceptual mind from all objects.

original: g-yo med pa ste rtog ba'i rlung dang bral ba'i phyir brtan par gnas pa na'o //🔽'dis ni rnam par rtog pa med kyang yod pa'i phyir na /🔽rnam par rtog pa ni tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: g-yo med pa ste rtog ba'i rlung dang bral ba'i phyir brtan par gnas pa na'o // 'dis ni rnam par rtog pa med kyang yod pa'i phyir na / rnam par rtog pa ni tha dad pa yin no //
translated: When it abides stably, without wavering, because it is free from the wind of conceptualization.

original: zhes bstan te //
analyzed: zhes bstan te //
translated: This teaches that conceptualization is different, because it exists even though it is not conceptualized.

original: thal bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas 'chad pa ni /
translated: The explanation by way of consequence is:

original: gal @156b te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal @156b te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If” means “if it were to exist.”

original: rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs pa med na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs pa med na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “When there is no assembly of conceptualization,”

original: rigs mthun par rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu med na'o //
analyzed: rigs mthun par rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu med na'o //
translated: when there is no cause of conceptualization of a similar type.

original: de'i tshe med pa zhes bya ba rags mthun pa'i rnam pa'i tshogs pa med par don 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i byed pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe med pa zhes bya ba rags mthun pa'i rnam pa'i tshogs pa med par don 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i byed pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, there would be no apprehension of objects without the assembly of a similar type of conceptualization, and there would be no function of the sense faculties.

original: med pa yang ma yin na des na'o //
analyzed: med pa yang ma yin na des na'o //
translated: But that is not the case.

original: de'i zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs na'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs na'o //
translated: “In that” refers to the state of the collection of conceptualization.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang ma 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang ma 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Not associated with conceptualization” means

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: free from conceptualization.

original: gal te thams cad la rnam par rtog pa yod pa'i phyir na rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i gnas skabs med pa nyid ma yin nam zhes dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te thams cad la rnam par rtog pa yod pa'i phyir na rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i gnas skabs med pa nyid ma yin nam zhes dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is asked, “Since conceptualization exists in everything, isn’t there no state free from conceptualization?”

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni rnam par med pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni rnam par med pa la'o //
translated: “In this” refers to the absence of form.

original: de'i tshe nyid ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe nyid ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dus na'o //
translated: “At that time” is the time of nonconceptualization.

original: de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs par spyar ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs par spyar ro //
translated: “At that time” is extracted from within and applied to “how?” and so on.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa'i dus na'o //
translated: “At that time” is the time of nonconceptuality.

original: nyams su myong ba ni rang gi yul la rang gi byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pa bskyod pas na /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni rang gi yul la rang gi byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pa bskyod pas na /
translated: Since experience is moved by conceptualization that follows its own function in its own field,

original: de las sngar 'byung ba yin gyi de dang dus mtshungs bar ni ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni 'di las bshad pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las sngar 'byung ba yin gyi de dang dus mtshungs bar ni ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni 'di las bshad pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is that it is prior to that, not simultaneous with it. This is what is explained here.

original: sngar bshad gnas skabs kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang ma 'brel ba'i gnas skabs kyi'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad gnas skabs kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang ma 'brel ba'i gnas skabs kyi'o //
translated: The phrase “in the prior state” refers to the state that is not associated with conceptualization.

original: dbang po'i rtog pa las ni /
analyzed: dbang po'i rtog pa las ni /
translated: From the conceptualization of the sense faculty,

original: kho bo'i rnam rtog 'di 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: kho bo'i rnam rtog 'di 'drar 'gyur //
translated: this conceptualization of mine has arisen.

original: zhes bya ba de med do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de med do //
translated: This is not the case.

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i dus nyid na 'di la yod par tha snyad byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i dus nyid na 'di la yod par tha snyad byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: If conceptualization is not the designation of the existence of something in the very moment of conceptualization,

original: des na gnas skabs 'ga' zhig rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar ji ltar brjod snyam na /
analyzed: des na gnas skabs 'ga' zhig rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar ji ltar brjod snyam na /
translated: then how can it be said that there is a certain state that is free from conceptualization?

original: de nyid kyi tshe zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe zhes smos so //
translated: The phrase “at that very time” is used in response to this question.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dus nyid kyi tshe'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dus nyid kyi tshe'o //
translated: It is at the very time that there is no conceptualization.

original: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the absence of conceptualization.

original: rnam par rtog pa de rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig snyam na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig snyam na /
translated: What is the nature of that conceptualization?

original: 'di rnam par rtog pa med pa'o snyam pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnam par rtog pa med pa'o snyam pa'o //
translated: “It is non-conceptual” is the thought.

original: gang gis de dgag par brjod pa yin pa'i tha snyad du byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa yod na ci nyes snyam na /
analyzed: gang gis de dgag par brjod pa yin pa'i tha snyad du byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa yod na ci nyes snyam na /
translated: What is wrong if there is a conceptual cognition that makes the conventional expression that negates that?

original: de lta ma yin pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: “It is not so” is stated.

original: gal te yod pa'i tha snyad du byed pa'i rnam par rtog ba de bzhin du yod na de'i tshe mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med par smra ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par smra la yang ngo //🔽'di ni rnam par rtog pa rnam par rtog pa @157a * //
analyzed: gal te yod pa'i tha snyad du byed pa'i rnam par rtog ba de bzhin du yod na de'i tshe mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med par smra ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par smra la yang ngo // 'di ni rnam par rtog pa rnam par rtog pa @157a * //
translated: If the conceptual cognition that makes the conventional expression exists in that way, then not only is direct perception said to be non-conceptual, it is also said to be conceptual.

original: gzhan dang dus mtshungs par khas blangs te brjod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang dus mtshungs par khas blangs te brjod par shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as a statement that accepts a conceptual cognition that is simultaneous with another conceptual cognition.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum la'o //
translated: “In that case” refers to direct perception that is conceptual.

original: gzhan gyi bya ba ni dus mtshungs pa'i rnam par rtog pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bya ba ni dus mtshungs pa'i rnam par rtog pas so //
translated: “The activity of another” is the conceptual cognition that is simultaneous.

original: lan ni rnam par rtog pa med pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba ni dus mnyams par 'byung bas so //
analyzed: lan ni rnam par rtog pa med pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba ni dus mnyams par 'byung bas so //
translated: The answer is: “Even in the absence of conceptualization.” Conceptualization occurs simultaneously.

original: des na de ltar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa bzhin du rnam par rtog pa med pa la yang dus mtshungs pa'i rnam par rtog pas yod pa'i tha snyad bya bar mi nus la /
analyzed: des na de ltar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa bzhin du rnam par rtog pa med pa la yang dus mtshungs pa'i rnam par rtog pas yod pa'i tha snyad bya bar mi nus la /
translated: Therefore, just as in the presence of conceptualization, in the absence of conceptualization, one cannot make the conventional designation “exists” on the basis of simultaneous conceptualization.

original: rang rig pa'i phyogs la ni don med do zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i phyogs la ni don med do zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the position of reflexive awareness is untenable.

original: 'o na rang rig pa'i phyogs la dus phyis 'byung ba nyid kyis de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin no zhes dogs ba pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na rang rig pa'i phyogs la dus phyis 'byung ba nyid kyis de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin no zhes dogs ba pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Now, if one objects that, in the case of reflexive awareness, the later moment of consciousness is conceptual but not all consciousnesses are, the text says, “But if you say that . . .”

original: de lta na ni 'o na de nyid tshe 'di rnam par rtog pa med pa'o zhes bya ba de dag gnas pa yin no zhes ston pas rnam 'grel rnam par 'grel pa ni 'di la yang zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na de nyid tshe 'di rnam par rtog pa med pa'o zhes bya ba de dag gnas pa yin no zhes ston pas rnam 'grel rnam par 'grel pa ni 'di la yang zhes bya ste /
translated: In that case, the opponent’s position is that the earlier moment of consciousness is nonconceptual. The text responds to this by saying, “In that case, it is that very earlier moment of consciousness that is nonconceptual.”

original: rnam par rtog pa gzhan dang bcas pa'i rtog pa med pa la'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gzhan dang bcas pa'i rtog pa med pa la'o //
translated: in the absence of conceptual thought that is accompanied by other conceptual thoughts.

original: rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs na /
translated: in the situation in which conceptual thoughts are collected together.

original: de ltar tha snyad mi byed pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar tha snyad mi byed pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it that one does not make conventional expressions at that time?

original: de la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de la zhes gsungs so //
translated: “In that case” is the answer.

original: rnam par rtog ba bsdus pa'i skabs su'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog ba bsdus pa'i skabs su'o //
translated: in the situation in which conceptual thoughts are collected together.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni tha snyad kyi dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni tha snyad kyi dus na'o //
translated: “At that time” is the time of conventional expressions.

original: shi ba la zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: shi ba la zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: “The dead” is the answer.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te de la tha snyad med na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te de la tha snyad med na'o //
translated: “Otherwise” is if there were no conventional expressions.

original: de'i tshe rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “At that time” is the time of conceptual thought.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
translated: “Also” is a particle of doubt.

original: de'i rigs can ni rnam par rtog pa'i rigs can no //
analyzed: de'i rigs can ni rnam par rtog pa'i rigs can no //
translated: “Of that type” is of the type of conceptual thought.

original: gnyig yang nye bar sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //🔽mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnyig yang nye bar sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o // mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Both” is a particle of collection.🔽“Different characteristics” is

original: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin tha dad pa dang phan tshun med pa yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin tha dad pa dang phan tshun med pa yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: different natures of the manifest and the unmanifest. “Mutual absence” is

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang cig shos dag re re med kyang yod pa'i phyir gcig nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang cig shos dag re re med kyang yod pa'i phyir gcig nyid ma yin no //
translated: Since the one without thought and the other exist even when the one does not exist, they are not identical.

original: phan tshun med par 'byung bar dogs pa bsu ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phan tshun med par 'byung bar dogs pa bsu ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The objection that they occur without each other is anticipated and answered in the statement, “Why is it not so?”

original: dran pa dang dbang po la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran pa dang dbang po la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because memory, the sense faculties, and so on exist.

original: de med pas ni de 'dra'i tshogs med pas so //
analyzed: de med pas ni de 'dra'i tshogs med pas so //
translated: Because they do not exist, such a collection does not exist.

original: dbang po 'ba' zhig yod pa las //
analyzed: dbang po 'ba' zhig yod pa las //
translated: From the mere existence of the sense faculties,

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is the meaning.

original: gang zhig rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i tshogs pa'i khyad par las gzhan nyid skye ba de ni da med par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang zhig rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i tshogs pa'i khyad par las gzhan nyid skye ba de ni da med par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: That which arises from a particular collection that includes thought is not nonexistent when that thought is absent.

original: gang zhig dbang po 'ba' zhig las byung ba de ni gzhan kho na yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig dbang po 'ba' zhig las byung ba de ni gzhan kho na yin te /
translated: That which arises from the mere sense faculties is something else.

original: bcas @157b ba gang yin pa de nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: bcas @157b ba gang yin pa de nyid ma yin no //
translated: It is not the same as that which is associated with thought.

original: de bas na phan tshun med pas 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i tshogs gcig kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'i 'don to //
analyzed: de bas na phan tshun med pas 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i tshogs gcig kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'i 'don to //
translated: Therefore, since they do not exist without each other, this is only a single conceptual aggregate. This is the doubt.

original: lan de ni ma 'brel te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan de ni ma 'brel te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is not connected.

original: ji ltar zhe na brjod pa gal te rnam par rtog pa dang bcas gcig pa nyid tshogs pa las yin par rtog na de'i tshe sngon po dang ser po dag tha dad pa med par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na brjod pa gal te rnam par rtog pa dang bcas gcig pa nyid tshogs pa las yin par rtog na de'i tshe sngon po dang ser po dag tha dad pa med par 'gyur /
translated: How so? It is said: If you imagine that the single conceptual [aggregate] is from a collection, then blue and yellow would be indistinguishable.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ba sdoms pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ba sdoms pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said: because of the combination.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
translated: That refers to what is being explained.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni bsdoms pa dang / 'ba' zhig pa dag gi nang nas sngon po dang ser bo gcig par mi bzod nas gzhan dag dogs par byed pa ni ci ste ngo shes pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni bsdoms pa dang / 'ba' zhig pa dag gi nang nas sngon po dang ser bo gcig par mi bzod nas gzhan dag dogs par byed pa ni ci ste ngo shes pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Among the combined and the solitary, since blue and yellow cannot be accepted as one, others suspect, Why? Because of recognition.

original: de nyid ces bya ba so sor mthong ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba so sor mthong ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: That itself is what is individually seen.

original: lan ni tha dad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni tha dad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “because they are different.”

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Therefore” means because they are different.

original: dbang po sogs pa'i tshogs pa khas blangs nas sun phyung ba yin no //
analyzed: dbang po sogs pa'i tshogs pa khas blangs nas sun phyung ba yin no //
translated: The refutation is made on the assumption that there is a collection of sense faculties, etc.

original: de 'thad pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de 'thad pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: But that is not tenable, as is stated in the following:

original: dran pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ Memory, etc.”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: dbang po'i zhes gsungs so //🔽'o na don gyi shes pa nyid rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i zhes gsungs so // 'o na don gyi shes pa nyid rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: “ Because of the sense faculties.”

original: brda sbyar ba la 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /🔽dbang ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: brda sbyar ba la 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhe na / dbang ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: But the cognition of an object is conceptual, because it grasps a linguistic symbol.🔽“ Because of the sense faculties.”

original: ci'i phyir zhen de brjod pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba ste rang gi mtshan nyid brjod ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhen de brjod pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba ste rang gi mtshan nyid brjod ba'o //
translated: Why? “ Because of the expression of that.”

original: ji ltar de brjod pa nyid med ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar de brjod pa nyid med ce na /
translated: How is there no expression of that?

original: rang gi mtshan nyid la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid la zhes gsungs so //
translated: “ Because of the particular.”

original: 'o na spyi 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i shes pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'o na spyi 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i shes pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: But the sense perception that grasps a universal is conceptual,

original: de la brda srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na spyi zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de la brda srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na spyi zhes gsungs so //
translated: because the convention is possible.🔽If the particular and the universal are not the objects of a convention and are not apprehended by the senses, how are they established?

original: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi dag brda'i yul ma yin pa dang / dbang po'i gzung ba ma yin par ji ltar 'grub ces bsams nas gzhan dag dogs par byed pa ni ci'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi dag brda'i yul ma yin pa dang / dbang po'i gzung ba ma yin par ji ltar 'grub ces bsams nas gzhan dag dogs par byed pa ni ci'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Others think thus and ask, “Why?”

original: de ltar gnyis pa'i'o //
analyzed: de ltar gnyis pa'i'o //
translated: This is the second alternative.

original: de la re zhig rang gi mtshan nyid brda'i yul ma yin par sgrub pa na gcig tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la re zhig rang gi mtshan nyid brda'i yul ma yin par sgrub pa na gcig tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the proof that the particular is not the object of a convention, the word “only” is used.

original: 'dis ni mngon sum gyi yul gyi khyad par ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni mngon sum gyi yul gyi khyad par ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: This means that the object of perception is not the object of conception.

original: spyi ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin yang dbang po'i shes pa'i gzung ba yin no zhes brjod ba yin no //
analyzed: spyi ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin yang dbang po'i shes pa'i gzung ba yin no zhes brjod ba yin no //
translated: The universal is the object of conception, but it is also apprehended by the sense consciousness.

original: de las zhes bya ba ste khyad par las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ste khyad par las so //
translated: “From that” means from the particular.

original: gzhan ni tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan ni tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Other” means different.

original: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni khyad par ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni khyad par ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The first half of the verse is explained by the words “The particular . . .”

original: ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba ma yin @158a * //
analyzed: ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba ma yin @158a * //
translated: How is it not a subsequent state?

original: zhe na / gang gi phyir zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhe na / gang gi phyir zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because of what?

original: gcig tu yul lam dus su'o //
analyzed: gcig tu yul lam dus su'o //
translated: In one place, in one time.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni nges par yul lam dus su'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni nges par yul lam dus su'o //
translated: In another place, in another time.

original: de nyid ni da ltar byung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni da ltar byung ba'o //
translated: That very thing is present.

original: gzhan gyi ni dus phyis 'byung bas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni dus phyis 'byung bas so //
translated: The other is future.

original: ci'i phyir mi mthong snyam na de na zhes gsungs te mngon sum mo //
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi mthong snyam na de na zhes gsungs te mngon sum mo //
translated: Why is it not seen? It is said: “There.” It is direct perception.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni mngon sum gyis ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni mngon sum gyis ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is clarified: “By direct perception.”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan du gnas pa med pas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan du gnas pa med pas so //
translated: “Therefore” means because it does not endure in another time.

original: mngon sum snga ma ni phyi ma la mi 'jug la mngon sum phyi ma yang snga ma la mi 'jug go zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mngon sum snga ma ni phyi ma la mi 'jug la mngon sum phyi ma yang snga ma la mi 'jug go zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The prior direct perception does not engage the subsequent, and the subsequent direct perception does not engage the prior.

original: ngo shes pa'i mngon sum ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag la 'jug pa yin no zhes dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ngo shes pa'i mngon sum ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag la 'jug pa yin no zhes dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: There is the doubt that the direct perception of recognition engages the prior and the subsequent, so it is said: “If you think…”

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: “No” is the response.

original: ji ltar mngon sum ma yin zhe na de la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ji ltar mngon sum ma yin zhe na de la zhes gsungs so //
translated: How is it not direct perception? He says, “In that case . . .”

original: ngo shes pa la'o //
analyzed: ngo shes pa la'o //
translated: It is in the case of recognition.

original: ji ltar dbang po'i byed pa med snyam na /
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po'i byed pa med snyam na /
translated: How is it that the sense faculty is not operative?

original: ji ltar zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, “Just as . . .”

original: 'on te dbang po la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa 'das pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa yin no zhe na ;
analyzed: 'on te dbang po la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa 'das pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa yin no zhe na ;
translated: But if it is the case that the consciousness that is based on the sense faculty engages the past, etc.,

original: de la brten pa'i zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: de la brten pa'i zhes gsungs so /
translated: he says, “That which is based on that . . .”

original: ci'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa dbang po mi 'jug snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa dbang po mi 'jug snyam na /
translated: Why is it that the sense faculty does not engage the past, etc.?

original: dbang po'i shes pas zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pas zhes gsungs so /
translated: He says, “The sense faculty consciousness . . .”

original: 'dzin pa la nyes pa brjod pa ni de ltar yin na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dzin pa la nyes pa brjod pa ni de ltar yin na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The objection to the apprehension is “If that is so . . .”

original: yul dang dus dang khyab pa 'dzin na'o //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang khyab pa 'dzin na'o //
translated: It is the apprehension of the object, the time, and the pervader.

original: phyer phyi ma 'chad pa'i phyir dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyer phyi ma 'chad pa'i phyir dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The anticipation of the objection to the latter is “If you say . . .”

original: 'chad pa snga ma lan 'debs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa snga ma lan 'debs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the former objection is “If you say . . .”

original: de'i tshe mig kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe mig kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, the eye would also engage.

original: ji ltar shes pa 'jug na mig kyang 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar shes pa 'jug na mig kyang 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it that when the consciousness engages, the eye also engages?

original: mig ces gsungs so //
analyzed: mig ces gsungs so //
translated: The eye is so-called.

original: shes pa 'jug pa las gzhan du'o //
analyzed: shes pa 'jug pa las gzhan du'o //
translated: Apart from the engagement of consciousness.

original: 'o na 'das pa la sogs pa 'dzin pa la mig byed pa yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'das pa la sogs pa 'dzin pa la mig byed pa yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But the eye does exist in the apprehension of the past, etc.

original: snga ma dang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: snga ma dang zhes gsungs so //
translated: The former, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: srid par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: srid par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The existence of the past, etc.

original: rgyu snga ma las 'bras bu phyi ma dang 'bras bu phyi ma las rgyu snga ma las srid par rjes su dpog pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu snga ma las 'bras bu phyi ma dang 'bras bu phyi ma las rgyu snga ma las srid par rjes su dpog pa'o //
translated: is inferred from the subsequent effect and the prior cause, and from the prior effect and the subsequent cause.

original: rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa nyid dbang po 'jug pa yin no zhes dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa nyid dbang po 'jug pa yin no zhes dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: The engagement of inference is the engagement of the sense faculties.

original: lan ni rjes su dpag pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni rjes su dpag pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is: Even inference, etc.

original: gang gi phyir khyad par gcig tu mthong ba ni gzhan du mthong ba de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par gcig tu mthong ba ni gzhan du mthong ba de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the perception of one particular is the perception of another particular.

original: phyed phyi ma bshad pa'i phyir dogs pa bsu ba ni spyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma bshad pa'i phyir dogs pa bsu ba ni spyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The anticipation of the explanation of the latter half is: The universal, etc.

original: khyad par las tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i spyi ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par las tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i spyi ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The universal is neither different nor non-different from the particular.

original: des na gang gi dbang po shes pa rnam @158b par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba de dbang pos gzung ba nyid ji ltar yin zhes bstan pa'i don du lan 'debs pa ni khyad par de ltas tha dad pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gang gi dbang po shes pa rnam @158b par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba de dbang pos gzung ba nyid ji ltar yin zhes bstan pa'i don du lan 'debs pa ni khyad par de ltas tha dad pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate how that which becomes the cognition of a sense faculty with conceptualization can be apprehended by a sense faculty, the reply is: “There is no difference in that way.”🔽

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that, how can that which is apprehended by a sense faculty be the same as that which has a sense faculty that is associated with conceptual cognition?

original: tha dad med phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad med phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is: “Because of the absence of difference.”

original: khyad par rnams la ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i spyi dang khyad par gyi rnam pa can gyi blo nyams su myong ba ni med de 'on kyang khyad par rnam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: khyad par rnams la ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i spyi dang khyad par gyi rnam pa can gyi blo nyams su myong ba ni med de 'on kyang khyad par rnam pa nyid yin no //
translated: The cognition that has the aspect of a universal and an individual that are different or not different does not experience the differences. Rather, it is the differences themselves.

original: spyi ni ma dmigs pa'i phyir med pa kho na'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: spyi ni ma dmigs pa'i phyir med pa kho na'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The universal does not exist at all, because it is not observed.

original: gal te gsal ba dang spyi dag rjes su 'gro bar srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba dang spyi dag rjes su 'gro bar srid pa'i phyir /
translated: If the individual and the universal are possible as mutually inclusive,

original: ji ltar brda'i yul la yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar brda'i yul la yin zhe na /
translated: how is it that they are the domain of conventional expressions?

original: khyad par rnams zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: khyad par rnams zhes gsungs so //
translated: The response is: “The differences.”

original: dbang pos gzung bar bya ba'i spyi yang rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: dbang pos gzung bar bya ba'i spyi yang rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te zhes 'brel to //
translated: The universal that is apprehended by the sense faculty is not a universal that is a subsequent attribute.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //🔽khyad par rnams rjes su 'gro ba ma yin la zhes brjod pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni //
analyzed: de ni med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o // khyad par rnams rjes su 'gro ba ma yin la zhes brjod pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni //
translated: Because it does not exist.

original: khyad par rnams ni zhes pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par rnams ni zhes pa'o //
translated: The statement “The particulars are not subsequent attributes” is clarified by the phrase “The particulars . . .”

original: spyi yang zhes brjod pa gsal bar byed pa ni spyi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: spyi yang zhes brjod pa gsal bar byed pa ni spyi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The statement “The universal . . .” is clarified by the phrase “The universal . . .”

original: dbang pos gzung ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang pos gzung ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not apprehended by the sense faculty.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de ni zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de ni zhes gsungs te /
translated: For that very reason, the phrase “Therefore . . .” is stated.

original: sa'i dbang pos gzung ba'i zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: sa'i dbang pos gzung ba'i zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: The phrase “that is apprehended by the sense faculty of touch” refers to a universal.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'dir ci ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir ci ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “What is that?” is stated here.

original: 'dir ni khyad par rnams la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni khyad par rnams la'o //
translated: Here, it is the particulars.

original: ci'i phyir mi snang snyam pa'i dogs pa sems pas tha dad blo med phyir zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pa ni rnam gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi snang snyam pa'i dogs pa sems pas tha dad blo med phyir zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pa ni rnam gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “Why is it not perceived?” is stated because of a doubt. The phrase “because there is no cognition of difference” is an explanation. The phrase “in another way” is stated.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “For that very reason” means because of non-apprehension.

original: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i spyi ni med pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i spyi ni med pa nyid yin la /
translated: A universal is either different from or non-different from the particulars.

original: mi dmigs pa las med kyang bla ste de khas len na nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni brjod du med pa yang med pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa las med kyang bla ste de khas len na nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni brjod du med pa yang med pa nyid do //
translated: It is better if it does not exist through non-apprehension. But if you accept it, there is another fault: it is also non-existent because inexpressible.

original: gang gi phyir spyi med pa de'i phyir dbang po las skyes blo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir spyi med pa de'i phyir dbang po las skyes blo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since there is no universal, therefore, “the cognition produced from the sense faculties” is as stated.

original: gal te khyad par nyid sgra'i yul yin pa des na de 'dzin pa'i dbang po shes pa rtogs pa med par ji ltar 'gyur snyam na khyad par rnams la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te khyad par nyid sgra'i yul yin pa des na de 'dzin pa'i dbang po shes pa rtogs pa med par ji ltar 'gyur snyam na khyad par rnams la zhes gsungs so //
translated: If the particular itself is the object of the word, then how could the sense cognition that apprehends it be non-conceptual? He says, “With regard to the particulars. . . .”

original: ci'i phyir 'jug pa mi srid snyam na khyad par zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'jug pa mi srid snyam na khyad par zhes gsungs so //
translated: Why is it impossible to engage? He says, “The particulars. . . .”

original: gal te khyad par nyid spyi yin pa des na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa khyad par gyi yul can du ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par nyid spyi yin pa des na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa khyad par gyi yul can du ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If the particular itself is the universal, then how could the sense consciousness be the subject that has the particular as its object?

original: rjes su 'gro ba med par zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med par zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, “Without the universal. . . .”

original: khyad par rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of “in particular” and so on is “in particular” is the object of the word.

original: ci'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa la brda mi 'jug snyam na brda ni zhes gsungs so //🔽de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te yul dang dus gzhan @159a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa la brda mi 'jug snyam na brda ni zhes gsungs so // de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te yul dang dus gzhan @159a * //
translated: If one wonders why a convention is not applied to that which does not pervade, he says, “A convention is . . .”

original: du tha snyad 'jug pa'i don du brda mi 'dod na'o //
analyzed: du tha snyad 'jug pa'i don du brda mi 'dod na'o //
translated: “Otherwise” means if one does not accept a convention for the purpose of applying a convention in another place and time.

original: de'i tshe zhen zhes pa de nyid du zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhen zhes pa de nyid du zhes bya'o //
translated: “At that time” is “in that case.”

original: tha snyad 'jug pa'i don to //
analyzed: tha snyad 'jug pa'i don to //
translated: “For the purpose of applying a convention” is “for the purpose of applying a convention.”

original: ma yin no zhes dogs pa ni chos kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin no zhes dogs pa ni chos kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one doubts that, he says, “A property . . .”

original: lan ni de lar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de lar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “In that case . . .”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni yul gzhan la sogs par tha snyad par 'jug pa'i don yin pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni yul gzhan la sogs par tha snyad par 'jug pa'i don yin pas na'o //
translated: “Therefore” means because it is for the purpose of applying a convention in another place and so on.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni so sor nges pa la brda mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni so sor nges pa la brda mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “For that reason” means because a convention is not applied to a specific object.

original: khyad par sgra'i yul ma yin mod /
analyzed: khyad par sgra'i yul ma yin mod /
translated: “A particular is not the object of a word.”

original: de lta na yang de sbyar nas 'dzin par ji ltar mi 'dod ces na /
analyzed: de lta na yang de sbyar nas 'dzin par ji ltar mi 'dod ces na /
translated: Even so, why not accept that it is apprehended by applying it?

original: sgra rnams zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: sgra rnams zhes gsungs te /
translated: The words all are stated.

original: de lar brdar btags pa rnams kyi yul lo //🔽gang zhig yin pa zhes bya ba ni yul la sogs par rjes su 'gro ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de lar brdar btags pa rnams kyi yul lo // gang zhig yin pa zhes bya ba ni yul la sogs par rjes su 'gro ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: They are the objects of those that are conventionally designated.🔽What is? refers to that which is the object, etc.

original: de nyid ci zhes bya ba ni rjes su mi 'gro ba ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ci zhes bya ba ni rjes su mi 'gro ba ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not that which is not, refers to that which is not the object, etc.

original: de rnams kyis zhes byang ni de ltar brdar btags pa'i sgra rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de rnams kyis zhes byang ni de ltar brdar btags pa'i sgra rnams kyis so //
translated: By those refers to those words that are conventionally designated in that way.

original: sbyor byed ces bya ba bum pa de ni 'di'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor byed ces bya ba bum pa de ni 'di'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words to connect means this is the pot.

original: des zhes bya ba ni khyad par la brda med pas na'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni khyad par la brda med pas na'o //
translated: The words by that means because there is no conventional designation for the particular.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sbyar nas 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sbyar nas 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The words therefore means because there is no apprehension of the connection.

original: ci'i phyir zhes bya bas ni rgyu ci'i phyir na khyad par nyid dang sbyor gyi khyad par ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes bya bas ni rgyu ci'i phyir na khyad par nyid dang sbyor gyi khyad par ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The words why? means for what reason is it that the particular is connected, but not the universal?

original: zhes pa la rnam par rtog pas shes pa la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la rnam par rtog pas shes pa la'o //
translated: The words because of the cognition of the conceptual differentiation means because of the cognition of the conceptual differentiation.

original: gang yin pa'i don de dag nyid do //
analyzed: gang yin pa'i don de dag nyid do //
translated: The words those very objects refers to the particular and the universal.

original: ci'i phyir zhes dris pa na brjod pa ni 'di zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes dris pa na brjod pa ni 'di zhes gsungs so //
translated: When asked, “Why?” he says, “Because it is said that . . . ”

original: shes pa gang gis tha snyad kyi dus su rtogs par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: shes pa gang gis tha snyad kyi dus su rtogs par bya ba yin te /
translated: By what cognition is it to be understood at the time of convention?

original: ci gang la lkog tu gyur pa'i don yod pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa des sam zhes bya ba'o //🔽re zhig rnam par rtog pa tha ma sel ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci gang la lkog tu gyur pa'i don yod pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa des sam zhes bya ba'o // re zhig rnam par rtog pa tha ma sel ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Is it by that which has an object that is hidden, and which is conceptual?🔽First, to eliminate the last conception, he says, “If . . . ”

original: rnam par rtog pa dang po'i dbang du byas te brjod pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang po'i dbang du byas te brjod pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: With regard to the first conception, he says, “But if . . . ”

original: / ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de'i tshe zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: / ci'i phyir zhe na / de'i tshe zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Why?🔽“At that time”

original: tha snyad kyi dus na'o //
analyzed: tha snyad kyi dus na'o //
translated: means at the time of convention.

original: dbang po'i yul gyi don rtogs bzhin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i yul gyi don rtogs bzhin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no understanding of the object of the sense faculties.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad brjod de gal te dbang po'i yul gyi don rang gi mtshan nyid la brda byed pa yin na ni de'i tshe tha snyad kyi dus su de nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad brjod de gal te dbang po'i yul gyi don rang gi mtshan nyid la brda byed pa yin na ni de'i tshe tha snyad kyi dus su de nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: This is what is being said: If the object of the sense faculties were to be signified by its own characteristics, then at the time of convention it would be understood as it is.

original: de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: des na de la brda byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na de la brda byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not the signifier.

original: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam 'grel la 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam 'grel la 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: Or else, etc. introduces the commentary.

original: don dang sgro med kyang 'brel bar byed pa'i phyir na de'i tshe dbang po'i spyod yul gyi don 'brel ba ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: don dang sgro med kyang 'brel bar byed pa'i phyir na de'i tshe dbang po'i spyod yul gyi don 'brel ba ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: Since it is related to the object and the word, the object that is the domain of the sense faculties is not related at that time.

original: 'on te yang gang gi tshe don 'das te med pa na @159b yang brda byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni //
analyzed: 'on te yang gang gi tshe don 'das te med pa na @159b yang brda byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni //
translated: But when the object has passed and is nonexistent, it is said to be the signifier.

original: de'i tshe yang rnam par rtog pa'i blo la don snang ba yod pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang rnam par rtog pa'i blo la don snang ba yod pa yin la /
translated: At that time also, the object appears to the conceptual cognition.

original: snang ba de nyid kyang don yin pa des na don kyang brda byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba de nyid kyang don yin pa des na don kyang brda byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: And since that appearance is the object, the object is the signifier.

original: snang ba tha dad yin yang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad yin yang zhes gsungs so //
translated: Even though the appearances are different, etc.

original: rnam par rtog pa la ni mi gsal par snang ba yin na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la ni mi gsal par snang ba yin na /
translated: If the object appears unclearly to the conceptual cognition,

original: de ji ltar na mngon sum la snang ba gsal ba'i don de la cig car 'gyur zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de ji ltar na mngon sum la snang ba gsal ba'i don de la cig car 'gyur zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: how could it be the object that appears clearly to perception?

original: 'dir slob dpon chos mchog gi lugs kyi dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon chos mchog gi lugs kyi dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The doubt according to the system of Master Dharmottara is stated in the words “If it is said.🔽. . . .”
