original: rtag par 'dzin pas ni 'khrul pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtag par 'dzin pas ni 'khrul pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not a mistake to apprehend it as permanent.

original: 'o na ji ltar dngos po rnams tha dad ce na /🔽tha dad pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'di la brjod pa ni don byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar dngos po rnams tha dad ce na / tha dad pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'di la brjod pa ni don byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But how are things different?🔽The difference is stated in the words “The difference is. . . .”

original: snang ba tha dad pa nyid don byed pa tha dad pa'i sgras brjod bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa nyid don byed pa tha dad pa'i sgras brjod bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The difference in appearance is expressed by the word “difference in function.”

original: gal te bum pa dang snam bu dag ci ltar tha dad ces bya ba 'dir chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa 'bras bu tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ma yin nam des na snang ba tha dad pa nyid don byed pa tha dad pa ji ltar
analyzed: gal te bum pa dang snam bu dag ci ltar tha dad ces bya ba 'dir chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa 'bras bu tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ma yin nam des na snang ba tha dad pa nyid don byed pa tha dad pa ji ltar
translated: If it is asked, “How are a pot and a cloth different?” is it not said, “Because of the difference in their effects, such as holding water?” In that case, how can the difference in appearance be the difference in function?

original: yin snyam na gzhan du gyur pa'i 'bras bu tha dad pa ni rgyu tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: yin snyam na gzhan du gyur pa'i 'bras bu tha dad pa ni rgyu tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: The difference in the effect that is different is not the characteristic of the difference in cause.

original: rgyu'i snang ba tha dad ba med bar zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: rgyu'i snang ba tha dad ba med bar zhes 'brel to //
translated: The difference in the appearance of the cause is not different.

original: de nyid las zhes bya ba ni snang ba tha dad pa nyid las so //
analyzed: de nyid las zhes bya ba ni snang ba tha dad pa nyid las so //
translated: “From that itself” means from the difference in appearance.

original: thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “There would be an infinite regress” means

original: 'bras bu gzhan dang 'bras bu gzhan tha dad pa'i sgo kho nas tha dad pa yin la de yang de las gzhan gyis yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan dang 'bras bu gzhan tha dad pa'i sgo kho nas tha dad pa yin la de yang de las gzhan gyis yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that the difference is only in terms of the difference of one effect from another effect, and that is due to something else.

original: 'bras bu tha dad pa snang ba tha dad pa las yin no zhe na ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad pa snang ba tha dad pa las yin no zhe na ni /
translated: If the difference of effects is due to the difference of appearances,

original: de'i tshe rgyu yang snang bas tha dad pa de nyid las so //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgyu yang snang bas tha dad pa de nyid las so //
translated: then the cause also is due to the difference of appearances.

original: gzhan yang brjod pa ni don byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang brjod pa ni don byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Moreover, the statement “that which performs a function”

original: de ni zhes bya ba mi slu ba'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba mi slu ba'o //
translated: means “that which is nondeceptive.”

original: des na rjes su dpag pa deng yang ngo //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pa deng yang ngo //
translated: Therefore, the inference is also nondeceptive.

original: gang gi phyir de lta ma yin pa de'i phyir tha dad pa ni thams cad du zhes blta'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta ma yin pa de'i phyir tha dad pa ni thams cad du zhes blta'o //
translated: Since that is not so, therefore, “the difference is not in all cases.”

original: de ltar bu la zhes bya ba ni mig mngon sum phye ba'i rtogs pa po la'o //
analyzed: de ltar bu la zhes bya ba ni mig mngon sum phye ba'i rtogs pa po la'o //
translated: “In that case” means for the cognizer whose eyes are open.

original: 'o na ji ltar 'brel snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar 'brel snyam na /
translated: But how is there a connection?

original: 'di'i zhes gsungs te zhes rnam pa de ltar bstan ba ste /
analyzed: 'di'i zhes gsungs te zhes rnam pa de ltar bstan ba ste /
translated: The phrase in this way refers to the teaching.

original: brjod pa'i don gang yin pa nyid sbyong ba yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa'i don gang yin pa nyid sbyong ba yin no //
translated: The meaning of the expression is that the object of purification is the same as the object of expression.

original: dod de nyid dbang bo'i shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam na /🔽mngon sum la ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dod de nyid dbang bo'i shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam na / mngon sum la ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: If you think that the object of expression is conceptual because it is the object of a sense consciousness, the root text states, Direct perception . . .

original: don rkyang ba tsam zhes bya ba ni rtags kyi don tsam mo //
analyzed: don rkyang ba tsam zhes bya ba ni rtags kyi don tsam mo //
translated: The phrase mere isolated object refers to the mere object of a sign.

original: re zhig 'di ni khas blangs nas brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: re zhig 'di ni khas blangs nas brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is stated for the time being, accepting the opponent's position.

original: rnam pa'i dbye ba'i don ni snad ba ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du'o //🔽rtags kyi don gzhan du rnam par @160a * //
analyzed: rnam pa'i dbye ba'i don ni snad ba ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du'o // rtags kyi don gzhan du rnam par @160a * //
translated: The meaning of the expression the object of a sign is not the meaning of the expression the object of a conceptual consciousness.

original: dbye ba'i don yang ci ste mi snang zhe na /
analyzed: dbye ba'i don yang ci ste mi snang zhe na /
translated: If you think that the meaning of the expression the object of a sign is not the meaning of the expression the object of a conceptual consciousness, then why does the object of a sign not appear as the object of a conceptual consciousness?

original: brjod pa ni 'di lta zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni 'di lta zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is, It is like this . . .

original: gal te 'di'i zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa phan gdags par byed pa dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa dag ma yin na 'o na ji ltar 'di'i rjod par byed pa ni 'di yin no zhes 'dre la pa yin //
analyzed: gal te 'di'i zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa phan gdags par byed pa dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa dag ma yin na 'o na ji ltar 'di'i rjod par byed pa ni 'di yin no zhes 'dre la pa yin //
translated: If the connection of this is not the relation of the one who benefits and the one who is benefited, then how is it that this is the expression of that?

original: 'dir ni brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byad pa dag phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin no zhes des zhes bya ba'o //🔽blo'i yul gyi don las res 'ga' sgre 'byung ste skye la /
analyzed: 'dir ni brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byad pa dag phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin no zhes des zhes bya ba'o // blo'i yul gyi don las res 'ga' sgre 'byung ste skye la /
translated: Here, the object of expression and the expression do not exist as the relation of the one who benefits and the one who is benefited.🔽The object of the mind sometimes arises from the expression, and sometimes the object that exists in the mind arises from the expression.

original: res 'ga' ni sga las blo la gnas pa'i don yin pa'i phyir te rnam pa de ltar blo'i rang bzhin dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed de gnyis so ;
analyzed: res 'ga' ni sga las blo la gnas pa'i don yin pa'i phyir te rnam pa de ltar blo'i rang bzhin dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed de gnyis so ;
translated: In this way, the nature of the mind and the verbal expression are the two.

original: / gal te de ltar yang mngon sum nyid kyi 'brel ba byed do //
analyzed: / gal te de ltar yang mngon sum nyid kyi 'brel ba byed do //
translated: If it is like that, then the connection is made by direct perception.

original: des na mngon sum la snang ba'i don nyid la brda byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na mngon sum la snang ba'i don nyid la brda byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the expression is made in regard to the object that appears to direct perception.

original: mngon sum la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mngon sum la zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, “to direct perception.”

original: de ni mngon sum la snang ba'o //
analyzed: de ni mngon sum la snang ba'o //
translated: That is what appears to direct perception.

original: mig la sogs pa skyed pa'i shes pa la snang ba'i dang tshul gang la yod pa de la brda byed pa yin na de'i tsha rang gi mtshan nyid de ni tha snyad kyi dus na sgra brjod pa'i rjes su snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa skyed pa'i shes pa la snang ba'i dang tshul gang la yod pa de la brda byed pa yin na de'i tsha rang gi mtshan nyid de ni tha snyad kyi dus na sgra brjod pa'i rjes su snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If something exists in the way it appears to the consciousness that produces the eye consciousness, etc., then it is said to be the conventional object.

original: snang ba nyid do snyam na /
analyzed: snang ba nyid do snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is just the appearance,

original: de ltar ni ma yin te zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te zhes gsungs so //
translated: then it is not so, as the root text says.

original: ci'i phyir min zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir min zhe na /
translated: Why is it not so?

original: rang nyid ces gsungs so //
analyzed: rang nyid ces gsungs so //
translated: The root text says, “itself.”

original: gal te brda ma byas kyang don rtogs na ni de'i tshe brda med par rtogs tshogs par 'gyur ro de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te brda ma byas kyang don rtogs na ni de'i tshe brda med par rtogs tshogs par 'gyur ro de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: If the object were understood even without the convention, then it would be understood without the convention. But that is not the case.

original: 'di nyid rnam pa gzhan du bshad pa'i phyir yang na zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam pa gzhan du bshad pa'i phyir yang na zhes gsungs so //
translated: In order to explain this point in another way, the root text says, “Or else.”

original: de lta bu nyid ni brda med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid ni brda med pa nyid do //
translated: That is just what is meant by “without the convention.”

original: 'on te gsal bar snang ba rnam par rtog pa med pa las mi gsal bar snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa 'di ni gzhan kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gsal bar snang ba rnam par rtog pa med pa las mi gsal bar snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa 'di ni gzhan kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is a different cognition, one that is non-conceptual and appears clearly, from this conceptual cognition that appears unclearly?

original: 'dir rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the word “conceptual” is used.

original: gal te rnam bar rtog pa gzhan yin na /
analyzed: gal te rnam bar rtog pa gzhan yin na /
translated: If it is a different conceptual cognition,

original: de'i tshe de'i gzung ba lkog tu yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i gzung ba lkog tu yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then its object would be hidden.

original: de lta yang ma yin no zhe na ston pa ni 'di la zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: de lta yang ma yin no zhe na ston pa ni 'di la zhes bya ba'o /
translated: If that is not so, then the teacher says, “Here, in this case.”

original: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan dag nyid sangs rgyas pa'i dogs pa bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan dag nyid sangs rgyas pa'i dogs pa bsdu ba'o //
translated: “But if” and so on refers to the doubts of others.

original: sngar yang zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi dus na yang ngo //
analyzed: sngar yang zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi dus na yang ngo //
translated: “Before” refers to the time of perception.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: “That” refers to the particular intrinsic identity.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i dus na'o /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i dus na'o /
translated: “Here” refers to the time of conceptualization.

original: 'on te khyad te khyad bar 'di nyid med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te khyad te khyad bar 'di nyid med do zhe na /
translated: But if there is no difference,

original: mthong ba nyid ni zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: mthong ba nyid ni zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: then the teacher says, “It is seen.”

original: rkang pa tha ma rnam par 'grel pa ni shes par gyur pa nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rkang pa tha ma rnam par 'grel pa ni shes par gyur pa nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary on the last line is: “The cognition itself is not real.”

original: pha rol nyid kyi dogs pa bsu ba ni rnam phyir na zhes bya ba ste /🔽mi @160b bden pa nyid do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: pha rol nyid kyi dogs pa bsu ba ni rnam phyir na zhes bya ba ste / mi @160b bden pa nyid do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Anticipating an objection from the opponent, he says, “Why?”🔽“Because it is not real.”

original: mi bden pa nyid do zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: mi bden pa nyid do zhes 'brel to //
translated: “It is not real” is connected to the previous line.

original: 'di gzhan gyi brjod ba ni 'dir tshad gang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di gzhan gyi brjod ba ni 'dir tshad gang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent’s statement is: “What is the measure of that?”

original: rnam par rtog pa yang yin la bden pa nyid kyang yin mod 'gal ba ci yod //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yang yin la bden pa nyid kyang yin mod 'gal ba ci yod //
translated: “It is a conception and it is real.” What is the contradiction?

original: 'on te de lta bu kho nar rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa mi bden par brjod na rnam par rtag pa med pa'i blo la yang zhes smras so //
analyzed: 'on te de lta bu kho nar rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa mi bden par brjod na rnam par rtag pa med pa'i blo la yang zhes smras so //
translated: But if you say that the cognition of conception is not real in that way, then he says, “Even in the cognition of nonconception.”🔽“It is not real” is connected to the previous line.

original: mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Directly perceived” means

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba lhag ma ni'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba lhag ma ni'o //
translated: “The cognition of conception” is the remainder.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni ba lang ba lang sbrul sbrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni ba lang ba lang sbrul sbrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “This” refers to “cow,” “cow,” “snake,” “snake,” and so on.

original: mngon sum gyi yul can yin yang 'di ni rjes su dpag pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi yul can yin yang 'di ni rjes su dpag pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: Even though it has a manifest object, it is inference.

original: yul gyi dbye ba nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul gyi dbye ba nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is inference because of the difference in the object.

original: 'on te mngon sum gyi yul gcig kho na las mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa las 'jug pa des na lkog tu ma gyur pa'i yul can yin yang rjes su dpag pa nyid do zhes na /
analyzed: 'on te mngon sum gyi yul gcig kho na las mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa las 'jug pa des na lkog tu ma gyur pa'i yul can yin yang rjes su dpag pa nyid do zhes na /
translated: But if it is inference because it engages a manifest object that is not different from a single manifest object, then it has a manifest object and is inference.

original: tshad ma nges pa med pa nyid ces smras so //
analyzed: tshad ma nges pa med pa nyid ces smras so //
translated: He says that there is no certainty about the valid cognition.

original: 'di ma grub pa'i mtha' brjod pa ni de thams cad ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ma grub pa'i mtha' brjod pa ni de thams cad ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He states the thesis that this is not established: All of that.

original: 'jug pa myur phyir zhes bya ba ni 'di ni gzhan gyi lugs la ltos pa kho na grub pa'i mtha'i nang du smos pa yin no //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni ba lang la sogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ltung gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa myur phyir zhes bya ba ni 'di ni gzhan gyi lugs la ltos pa kho na grub pa'i mtha'i nang du smos pa yin no // rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni ba lang la sogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ltung gyur pa'o //
translated: Because of the speed of engagement. This is mentioned in the tenets of others only in terms of dependence.🔽The specific characteristic is the apprehension of the specific characteristic of a cow, etc.

original: yi ge'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni ba la sogs pa'i yi ger zhen pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni ba la sogs pa'i yi ger zhen pa'o //
translated: The form of the letter is the attachment to the letter ba, etc.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni ba lang la sogs par snang ba las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni ba lang la sogs par snang ba las so //
translated: “From that” means from the appearance as an ox, etc.

original: 'o na mngon sum gyi shes pa gang zhig yin snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na mngon sum gyi shes pa gang zhig yin snyam na /
translated: Now, what is the direct perception?

original: bdun na zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bdun na zhes gsungs so //
translated: “In the seventh,” he says.

original: ci ltar na shes pa 'di nyid mngon sum yin gyi /
analyzed: ci ltar na shes pa 'di nyid mngon sum yin gyi /
translated: How is this consciousness direct perception?

original: snga ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: snga ma yin zhe na /
translated: Is it the former or the latter?

original: de la ni zhes bya ba ste snga ma la'o //
analyzed: de la ni zhes bya ba ste snga ma la'o //
translated: “In that,” he says, in the former.

original: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni phyi ma nyid do //
analyzed: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni phyi ma nyid do //
translated: “This” refers to the latter.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bar rnam par dpyod par byed pa la ltos nas ni med pa kho na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bar rnam par dpyod par byed pa la ltos nas ni med pa kho na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In dependence on the one who analyzes the tenets, it is said that it is only nonexistent.

original: snang ba tha dad pas zhes bya ba ni ba la sogs ba'i yi ger zhen pa ni mi gsal bar snang la /
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pas zhes bya ba ni ba la sogs ba'i yi ger zhen pa ni mi gsal bar snang la /
translated: “Due to the difference in appearance” means that the conception of the letters “ba” and so on appears unclearly,

original: khra bo la sogs pa ni gsal bar snang ba'o //
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa ni gsal bar snang ba'o //
translated: while the multicolored and so on appear clearly.

original: re zhig ba la sogs pa'i yi ge rnam par rtog pa dang / khro bo la sogs pa snang ba yin pa lta bar zhog ste /
analyzed: re zhig ba la sogs pa'i yi ge rnam par rtog pa dang / khro bo la sogs pa snang ba yin pa lta bar zhog ste /
translated: First, let us set aside the conception of the letters “ba” and so on and the appearance of the multicolored and so on.

original: yi ge ba dang da la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyang gcig nyid ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du ye ge ba la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par gyi dngos po gcig nyid ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyi tshig brjod pa ni rim🔽gyis zhes bya ba'o //🔽rim @161a * //
analyzed: yi ge ba dang da la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyang gcig nyid ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du ye ge ba la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par gyi dngos po gcig nyid ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyi tshig brjod pa ni rim gyis zhes bya ba'o // rim @161a * //
translated: The words “in sequence” are stated in order to show that the concepts of the letters “ba” and “da” and so on are not identical.

original: gyis 'byung ba dag la ni gcig nyid srid pa ma yin no //🔽'on te yi ge ba la sogs par zhen pa gang yin pa nyid rnam par rtog pa med par khro bo rtog bar byed pa yin no zhe na /🔽yi ger zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gyis 'byung ba dag la ni gcig nyid srid pa ma yin no // 'on te yi ge ba la sogs par zhen pa gang yin pa nyid rnam par rtog pa med par khro bo rtog bar byed pa yin no zhe na / yi ger zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words “in sequence” are stated in order to show that the concepts of the letters “ba” and “da” and so on are not identical.🔽The words “in sequence” are stated in order to show that the concepts of the letters “ba” and “da” and so on are not identical.🔽The words “in sequence” are stated in order to show that the concepts of the letters “ba” and “da” and so on are not identical.🔽The words “in sequence” are stated in order to show that the concepts of the letters “ba” and “da” and so on are not identical.

original: de zhes bya ba yi ger snang ba med kyang ngo //🔽gzhan gyi de med kyang zhes smras te /🔽yi ger snang ba med kyang ngo //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba yi ger snang ba med kyang ngo // gzhan gyi de med kyang zhes smras te / yi ger snang ba med kyang ngo //
translated: The words “in sequence” are stated in order to show that the concepts of the letters “ba” and “da” and so on are not identical.🔽The words “in sequence” are stated in order to show that the concepts of the letters “ba” and “da” and so on are not identical.

original: rang bzhin de nyid du snang ba ni nges pa yin no zhe na sngon gyi zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin de nyid du snang ba ni nges pa yin no zhe na sngon gyi zhes gsungs so //
translated: The words “in sequence” are stated in order to show that the concepts of the letters “ba” and “da” and so on are not identical.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba la sngon snang ba nges pa zhes bya ba de ltar de sngon snang ba de dang gcig tu nges par bya ba nyid nges pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba la sngon snang ba nges pa zhes bya ba de ltar de sngon snang ba de dang gcig tu nges par bya ba nyid nges pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase “that which is called other” refers to the prior appearance. The meaning of the phrase “that which is called ascertainment” is that the prior appearance is ascertained as being the same as that.

original: gal te don dam par shes pa de gnyis gcig pa nyid ma yin na //
analyzed: gal te don dam par shes pa de gnyis gcig pa nyid ma yin na //
translated: If those two cognitions are not the same in reality,🔽then how is it that those of lesser intelligence ascertain them as the same?

original: de'i tshe ji ltar blo dman pa rnams gcig tu nges pa yin zhes bsams nas smras pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ji ltar blo dman pa rnams gcig tu nges pa yin zhes bsams nas smras pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of the phrase “then how is it that” is that they think this.

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The phrase “the result” refers to the conclusion.

original: gal te de dag tha dad pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: gal te de dag tha dad pa kho na yin na /
translated: If they are different,

original: de'i tshe 'o na rim gyis zhes bya ba'o //🔽rim gyis 'dzin par nges na ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'o na rim gyis zhes bya ba'o // rim gyis 'dzin par nges na ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: then how is it that they are ascertained as the same?🔽The phrase “they are ascertained as the same” means that they are ascertained as the same at the same time.

original: 'on kyang dus gcig tu 'dzin par nges pa yin no khyed kyi ltar na ni 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig kho na rem gyes yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang dus gcig tu 'dzin par nges pa yin no khyed kyi ltar na ni 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig kho na rem gyes yin la /
translated: But according to you, the ascertainment is gradual,

original: lhag par zhen pa ni cig car kho na yin no //
analyzed: lhag par zhen pa ni cig car kho na yin no //
translated: but the adherence is simultaneous.

original: des na ji ltar khyed kyi 'dod pas de dag tha dad kyang cig car lhag par zhen par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du //
analyzed: des na ji ltar khyed kyi 'dod pas de dag tha dad kyang cig car lhag par zhen par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du //
translated: Therefore, just as you assert that they are different and simultaneously apprehend them,

original: kho bo cag gi ltar na 'dzin pa yin par 'gyur ro zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: kho bo cag gi ltar na 'dzin pa yin par 'gyur ro zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: so, according to us, they are apprehended.🔽This is the thought.

original: rnam par rtog pa de la'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de la'o //
translated: In that conception.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni pha rol nyid sangs rgyas ba'i dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni pha rol nyid sangs rgyas ba'i dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: Also in that means that he anticipates the objection that it is impossible for the object to be different from the consciousness.

original: de nyid kyis smras ba ni 'on ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis smras ba ni 'on ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That very objection he states: But then.

original: zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni chags pas so //
analyzed: zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni chags pas so //
translated: By that means by attachment.

original: rnam par rtog pa des so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa des so //
translated: By that conception.

original: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra ba yul med pa nyid du dogs nas bar chad 'gog par byed par byed pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra ba yul med pa nyid du dogs nas bar chad 'gog par byed par byed pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, fearing that the doctrine of the school will be without an object, he interrupts to refute that: It is not so.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de'i lugs nyid kyis grub pa'i mtha' brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de'i lugs nyid kyis grub pa'i mtha' brjod pa'o //
translated: Moreover, etc. states the doctrine of the school itself.

original: gzhan gyi ltar na rigs pa pa'i ltar na yod do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ltar na rigs pa pa'i ltar na yod do //
translated: According to others, i.e., the logicians, it exists.

original: rigs ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog tshe ni brdar ro //🔽ji ltar ba lang gi mthong ba rgyun 'chad pa min zhes bya ba ni ltos pa'o //
analyzed: rigs ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog tshe ni brdar ro // ji ltar ba lang gi mthong ba rgyun 'chad pa min zhes bya ba ni ltos pa'o //
translated: The class is different when there is a conceptual discrimination.🔽The time is the interval.

original: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni mngon sum zhes bya ba'o //🔽gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni rigs pa can gyi ltar na'am /
analyzed: phyed snga ma 'chad pa ni mngon sum zhes bya ba'o // gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni rigs pa can gyi ltar na'am /
translated: The first half of the verse explains perception.

original: yang na mthong ba'i don gyi mngon sum gyi shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: yang na mthong ba'i don gyi mngon sum gyi shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin no //
translated: The other, i.e., the Naiyāyikas, or else, the nature of the cognition of perception which has the object as its content is not the same.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dus na'o //
translated: In that case, i.e., when there is a conceptual discrimination of a different class, the perception is not interrupted.

original: rigs mi @161b mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa las sngon rol gyi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / de bzhin dus kyi 'byung ba'i mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid kyi dngos po ni stobs dang ldan pas mthong ba de gnyis kyi bar du zhugs pa mthong ba ma yin pa rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par sgrib pa'o //
analyzed: rigs mi @161b mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa las sngon rol gyi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / de bzhin dus kyi 'byung ba'i mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid kyi dngos po ni stobs dang ldan pas mthong ba de gnyis kyi bar du zhugs pa mthong ba ma yin pa rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par sgrib pa'o //
translated: The perception which is prior to the conceptual discrimination of a different class, and the perception which occurs at the time of that, that very thing, being powerful, is perceived between those two perceptions. The perception of a different class is not obscured.

original: mi srid do zhes bya ba ni rigs mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dus sam /
analyzed: mi srid do zhes bya ba ni rigs mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dus sam /
translated: It is impossible is the reply.

original: rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dus su yang bar du gcod pa ni srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dus su yang bar du gcod pa ni srid pa ma yin no //
translated: It is impossible that there be an obstruction at the time of a homogeneous conceptual thought or at the time of a heterogeneous conceptual thought.

original: bar chod rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar chod rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that the obstruction would be cognized.

original: bar chod yod kyang myur ba'i phyir bar du mchod par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bar chod yod kyang myur ba'i phyir bar du mchod par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that even though there is an obstruction, it is not cognized because it is too fast,

original: gyur pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gyur pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it would not be cognized because it would have ceased.

original: yi ge dag kyang zhes bya ba ni sar dang sa ra zhes bya ba la sogs par ro //
analyzed: yi ge dag kyang zhes bya ba ni sar dang sa ra zhes bya ba la sogs par ro //
translated: And the letters are also is the reply.

original: rim dang ldan pa la yang zhes bya ba ni bar chod yod pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: rim dang ldan pa la yang zhes bya ba ni bar chod yod pa la yang ngo //
translated: And also in those possessing a sequence is the reply.

original: de la ni mtsho dang ro zhes bya ba la sogs par ro //
analyzed: de la ni mtsho dang ro zhes bya ba la sogs par ro //
translated: In that case, it would be like a lake and a corpse.

original: dus gcig tu thos pa ma yin pa ni rim gyis thos pa'o //
analyzed: dus gcig tu thos pa ma yin pa ni rim gyis thos pa'o //
translated: Not heard simultaneously is heard gradually.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' ste /
translated: Here is the reply.

original: rigs mi mthun pa'i rtog pa dang rtog pa med pa gnyis la'o //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa'i rtog pa dang rtog pa med pa gnyis la'o //
translated: In the case of both homogeneous and heterogeneous conceptual thoughts and nonconceptual states.

original: gzhan gyis smras pa rdul gyi tshad la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid can yin gyi dbang po dag dus gcig tu 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras pa rdul gyi tshad la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid can yin gyi dbang po dag dus gcig tu 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The characteristics of the sense faculties are possessed of the measure of atoms, etc., because the sense faculties do not operate simultaneously.

original: de las byung ba'i shes pa rim gyis 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i shes pa rim gyis 'byung ba yin te /
translated: The consciousness that arises from them arises in succession.

original: des na myur ba nyid las dus gcig pa mngon par rlom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽'di las brjod pa ni 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na myur ba nyid las dus gcig pa mngon par rlom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // 'di las brjod pa ni 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the idea of simultaneity is due to speed alone.🔽This is the meaning.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni myur pa med na'o //🔽rim gyis skye ba dag la gal te myur ba yang med na ni //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni myur pa med na'o // rim gyis skye ba dag la gal te myur ba yang med na ni //
translated: The expression “in this way” refers to the above.🔽If there were no speed,

original: de'i tshe dus gcig tu mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro zhes mnos pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe dus gcig tu mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro zhes mnos pa'o //
translated: then, in the case of successive arising, there would be no idea of simultaneity.

original: mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
translated: The word “supreme” means “superior.”

original: yi ge rnam pa gcig thos pa'i rgyu mgyogs pa nyid med do zhas brjod pa gang yin pa de la brjod pa ni dbang po'i nyes pa lnga po rnams kyis chos kyang chod pa med pa de bzhin du snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i blo gang yin pa
analyzed: yi ge rnam pa gcig thos pa'i rgyu mgyogs pa nyid med do zhas brjod pa gang yin pa de la brjod pa ni dbang po'i nyes pa lnga po rnams kyis chos kyang chod pa med pa de bzhin du snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i blo gang yin pa
translated: To that, we reply: Just as the five faults of the sense faculty do not obstruct the object, in the same way, the cognition that conceives the appearance of the object🔽appears to be obstructed.

original: de chod par snang do zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar te /
analyzed: de chod par snang do zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar te /
translated: This is amazing!

original: ya mtshan che'o //
analyzed: ya mtshan che'o //
translated: This is astonishing!

original: 'dir yang chod par snang ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dir yang chod par snang ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here, it means that it would appear to be obstructed.

original: ci'i phyir zha na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zha na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ming ste sgra'i mthar thug pa'i skad cig gang yin pa de dang 'dre ba'i phyir te 'du ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ming ste sgra'i mthar thug pa'i skad cig gang yin pa de dang 'dre ba'i phyir te 'du ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is mixed with, that is, combined with, the final moment of the name, that is, sound.

original: de ltar lhag par zhen pa ni cig car ba nyid du zhen pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar lhag par zhen pa ni cig car ba nyid du zhen pa'o //
translated: Thus, the conception is of simultaneity.

original: ji ltar mi 'gyur bya ba ni tsag car ba nyid du lhag par zhen par zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'gyur bya ba ni tsag car ba nyid du lhag par zhen par zhes 'brel to //
translated: How could it not be? The conception is of simultaneity.

original: de bas @162a * //
analyzed: de bas @162a * //
translated: Therefore,

original: kyang zhes bya ba ni sa ra dang sa ra zhes bya bas kyang ngo //
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba ni sa ra dang sa ra zhes bya bas kyang ngo //
translated: even with the sound of “sara sara,”

original: dri zhim pa'i tshig ni dri nye ba'o //
analyzed: dri zhim pa'i tshig ni dri nye ba'o //
translated: A fragrant word is a near smell.

original: blta na sdug ba'i na chung ni gzugs so //
analyzed: blta na sdug ba'i na chung ni gzugs so //
translated: A beautiful young woman is a form.

original: kha'i ro myang ba zhes bya ba ni reg bya dang ro dag go //
analyzed: kha'i ro myang ba zhes bya ba ni reg bya dang ro dag go //
translated: Tasting the mouth is both touch and taste.

original: der ni zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa drug skye ba'i dus na'o //
analyzed: der ni zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa drug skye ba'i dus na'o //
translated: There means at the time of the arising of the six consciousnesses.

original: de 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni yi ge rnams kyi mgyogs pa ci 'dra ba de dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni yi ge rnams kyi mgyogs pa ci 'dra ba de dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Like that means like the speed of the letters.

original: yi ge rnams la yang zhes bya ba ni ro dang mtsho zhes bya ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: yi ge rnams la yang zhes bya ba ni ro dang mtsho zhes bya ba rnams la'o //
translated: Also means also in the letters.

original: sa ra sa ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge'i yul can skad cig ma'i shes pa gang yin pa des bar du chod pa der mgyogs pas cig car zhen pa bsgrub par ji ltar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sa ra sa ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge'i yul can skad cig ma'i shes pa gang yin pa des bar du chod pa der mgyogs pas cig car zhen pa bsgrub par ji ltar mi 'gyur te /
translated: How could the cognition of the moment that has as its object the letters of “sarasara” and so on not establish the simultaneous apprehension of that which is interrupted by it through speed?

original: 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: It would do so, is the meaning.

original: khyad med na zhes bya ba ni thams cad la'o //
analyzed: khyad med na zhes bya ba ni thams cad la'o //
translated: If there is no difference means if there is no difference in all.

original: de'i tshe don nye ba la yang zhes bya ba tshogs pa la yong ngo //
analyzed: de'i tshe don nye ba la yang zhes bya ba tshogs pa la yong ngo //
translated: Then also means in the collection at the time of the near object.

original: yul gzhan la chags pa gang yin pa des nus pa nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de yod par yin na ni rkyen du mi 'gyur te skyed byed du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul gzhan la chags pa gang yin pa des nus pa nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de yod par yin na ni rkyen du mi 'gyur te skyed byed du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were to exist as that which is diminished by attachment to another object, it would not be a condition, it would not be a producer.

original: gang gi zhe na nye bar gnas pa thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i'o //
analyzed: gang gi zhe na nye bar gnas pa thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i'o //
translated: Of what? Of the consciousness that is present.

original: gzhan gyi mtshungs pa ma yin te zhes smras so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi mtshungs pa ma yin te zhes smras so //
translated: It is not the same as the other, it is said.

original: yid kyi zhes bya ba ni dbang ba'i'o //
analyzed: yid kyi zhes bya ba ni dbang ba'i'o //
translated: “Of the mind” means of the sense faculty.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement here is “Even so,” etc.

original: 'di ni yid khas blangs te brjod pa yin na ni de nyid kyang mi srid do zhes brjod pa ni rnam par shes pa snga ma las ma rtogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yid khas blangs te brjod pa yin na ni de nyid kyang mi srid do zhes brjod pa ni rnam par shes pa snga ma las ma rtogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If this is a statement that accepts the mind, then that itself is impossible, it is said. The statement is “Not understood from a previous consciousness,” etc.

original: mtshams sbyar bas zhes bya bas ni snga phyi mtshams sbyar bas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshams sbyar bas zhes bya bas ni snga phyi mtshams sbyar bas ni ma yin te /
translated: By means of connection, it is said, it is not by means of a connection between prior and subsequent.

original: mi gsal bar snang ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi gsal bar snang ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is obtained as unclear appearance.

original: mgal me la sogs pa myur du 'jug pa'i rjes su 'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa des gnod pa gang la yod pa'i mig gang yin pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: mgal me la sogs pa myur du 'jug pa'i rjes su 'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa des gnod pa gang la yod pa'i mig gang yin pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: The eye that is harmed by that which is the characteristic of cyclic existence, the succession of the rapid spinning of a firebrand, etc., is so called.

original: mthong ba ste shes pa rnams mtshams sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba ste shes pa rnams mtshams sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The cognitions, the seeings, are not connected.

original: da ni rang nyid blo cig car ba nyid du bsgrub pa'i don du gzhan gyi tshul nye bar 'god pa ni ci ste yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ni rang nyid blo cig car ba nyid du bsgrub pa'i don du gzhan gyi tshul nye bar 'god pa ni ci ste yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Now, in order to establish that one’s own mind is instantaneous, he presents the opponent’s view: “But if you say . . .”

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas gsungs pa 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas gsungs pa 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The philosopher says, “Well then . . .”

original: cig car snang ba la yang tshad ma ci yod snyam na /
analyzed: cig car snang ba la yang tshad ma ci yod snyam na /
translated: “What is the evidence for the instantaneous appearance?”

original: cig car zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: cig car zhes gsungs so //
translated: “Instantly” is stated.

original: de zhes bya ba ni cig car snang ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni cig car snang ba'o //
translated: “That” refers to the instantaneous appearance.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid du'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid du'o //
translated: “Thus” refers to the characteristic of error.

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa ni bram bre'i 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa ni bram bre'i 'dod pa'o //
translated: “The opponent’s view” is the view of the Brāhmaṇas.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni don brjod pa na nyams su myong ba'i rnams pas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni don brjod pa na nyams su myong ba'i rnams pas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “and so on” indicates that the meaning is to be understood by the experience of engaging in the act.

original: dpe @162b nyid bsgrub pa ni byis pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpe @162b nyid bsgrub pa ni byis pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The example is established by the phrase “like a child.”

original: de skad smra ba'i bram ze de dag gi lugs ltar na mngon sum kho nar 'gyur gyi rnam par rtog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de skad smra ba'i bram ze de dag gi lugs ltar na mngon sum kho nar 'gyur gyi rnam par rtog pa ma yin te /
translated: According to the system of those Brahmins who speak in this way, perception would be the only means of knowing that is not conceptual.

original: brda med pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa'o //
analyzed: brda med pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa'o //
translated: This is because there is no conventional symbol.

original: 'gyur mod ces bya ba la sogs pas gzhan gyi tshig gi dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyur mod ces bya ba la sogs pas gzhan gyi tshig gi dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this objection is stated in the phrase “but that is not so.”

original: ci ste zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase “why is that?” is the objection.

original: snga ma dang phyi mar rtog pa zhes rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi mar rtog pa zhes rjes su 'jug go //
translated: The response is stated in the phrase “because it is conceptual.”

original: lan ni phyis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni phyis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is stated in the phrase “but that is not so.”

original: thabs med pa nyid bsgrub pa ni brda 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thabs med pa nyid bsgrub pa ni brda 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The proof that there is no method is stated in the phrase “because there is no one who holds a conventional symbol.”

original: de ni zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The conceptual thought is stated in the phrase “that is not so.”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod pa'i yid brda 'dzin pa'i phyir phyis zhes bya ba rtog pa'i gnas skabs na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod pa'i yid brda 'dzin pa'i phyir phyis zhes bya ba rtog pa'i gnas skabs na'o //
translated: “Therefore” means that the mind of analysis is the basis of the conceptual thought “later.”

original: gnod par byed pa la gzhan yang brjod pa ni byis pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa la gzhan yang brjod pa ni byis pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Moreover” introduces another objection.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Because there is no relation” means

original: gal te dbang po'i shes pas kyang rda 'dzin nus na de la gnod par byed pa ci yod ces bya ba dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te dbang po'i shes pas kyang rda 'dzin nus na de la gnod par byed pa ci yod ces bya ba dgongs pa'o //
translated: that if the sense consciousness could apprehend the pot, what would be the point of the conceptual thought?

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni shed byed la yang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni shed byed la yang ngo //
translated: “In all cases” means also in the case of the creator.

original: de ltar ni rnam par rtog pa med par ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni rnam par rtog pa med par ro //
translated: “In that way” means without conceptual thought.

original: byis pa kho na'i rnam par rtog pa med par 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: byis pa kho na'i rnam par rtog pa med par 'gyur gyi //
translated: “Only the childish” would be without conceptual thought.

original: gzhan gyi ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the others would have conceptual thought.

original: 'on te dpe des gzhan yang rtog pa med pa nyid du 'grub po snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te dpe des gzhan yang rtog pa med pa nyid du 'grub po snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the example also proves that there is no conceptual thought,

original: gnod par byed pa'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: then “the objection” is stated.

original: gnod byed kyi tshad mas 'brel pa grub pa ste /🔽nges pa gang yin pa de med par ro //🔽ci ste gzhan dogs par byas nas 'di zhes bya bas lan 'debs te /🔽dbang po'i shes pa 'di'o //🔽gzhan dag mngon du byed pas snga phyi 'dzin pas stong par ston pa ni mngon sum du zhes bya ba'o //🔽don med pa nyid ston pa ni rtog pa med pa nyid ni zhes bya bro //🔽de'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi rjes su 'brangs nas so //
analyzed: gnod byed kyi tshad mas 'brel pa grub pa ste / nges pa gang yin pa de med par ro // ci ste gzhan dogs par byas nas 'di zhes bya bas lan 'debs te / dbang po'i shes pa 'di'o // gzhan dag mngon du byed pas snga phyi 'dzin pas stong par ston pa ni mngon sum du zhes bya ba'o // don med pa nyid ston pa ni rtog pa med pa nyid ni zhes bya bro // de'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi rjes su 'brangs nas so //
translated: without the valid cognition that harms it, i.e., without the ascertainment that it is not related to the object.🔽🔽If someone else doubts this, then the response is:🔽This is the cognition of the sense faculty.🔽The demonstration that it is empty of the apprehension of prior and subsequent by the manifestation of other is:🔽The demonstration of its meaninglessness is:🔽The non-imagination is...🔽Following that is following the direct perception.

original: ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan dag byis pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par rtog pa med pa yin par mngon du byed pas bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /🔽gzhan ni ma yin pa des na dbang po las skyes pa la sogs pa don med par mi 'gyur ro zhes ston pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan dag byis pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par rtog pa med pa yin par mngon du byed pas bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /🔽gzhan ni ma yin pa des na dbang po las skyes pa la sogs pa don med par mi 'gyur ro zhes ston pa'o //

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni shed byed ba la yang //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni shed byed ba la yang //
translated: Here, also means that it is also in the case of the creator.

original: skal ba la zhes bya ba ni skabs pa'i yul can gyi rnam par rtog pa la'o //
analyzed: skal ba la zhes bya ba ni skabs pa'i yul can gyi rnam par rtog pa la'o //
translated: In the case of destiny, it refers to conceptualization that has a specific object.

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa la'o //
translated: In the case of other, it refers to conceptualization.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has an object that is not hidden means because it is itself manifest.

original: @163a * // 'on khyod kyang mngon du byed pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pa 'grub par 'dod pa nyid ma yin nam //
analyzed: @163a * // 'on khyod kyang mngon du byed pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pa 'grub par 'dod pa nyid ma yin nam //
translated: But don't you also accept that the establishment of non-conceptualization is itself manifest?

original: des na tshig gang gis rtog pa med pa 'grub par bya ba'i don du mngon du byed pa sgrub par byed par slob dpon gyis gsungs she na /🔽mngon sum du byed pa de ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na tshig gang gis rtog pa med pa 'grub par bya ba'i don du mngon du byed pa sgrub par byed par slob dpon gyis gsungs she na / mngon sum du byed pa de ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: Then why did the master state that the establishment of manifestation is for the purpose of establishing non-conceptualization with the words because it has an object that is not hidden?🔽He said that manifestation.

original: brjod do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brjod do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is said means it is indicated.

original: nye bar mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: It is a metaphor.

original: rnam par rtog pa med par grub par bya ba la gtan tshigs sngon du byed pa nyid gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med par grub par bya ba la gtan tshigs sngon du byed pa nyid gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the reason for the fact that the proof of non-conceptuality is preceded by the proof?

original: rnam par rtog pa nyid ni zhes sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po dgag par byed pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa nyid ni zhes sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po dgag par byed pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: The proof of non-conceptuality is the negation of the entity to be proved.

original: de yang 'gal ba yang rtog ba med pa yin zhing des ni mngon du byed pa khyab pa yin te des na 'gal pas khyab pa dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'gal ba yang rtog ba med pa yin zhing des ni mngon du byed pa khyab pa yin te des na 'gal pas khyab pa dmigs pa yin no //
translated: And that is non-conceptual, and it is pervaded by manifestation. Therefore, there is the observation of the pervasion by the contradictory.

original: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po gsungs pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po gsungs pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Another way of stating the entity to be proved and the proving entity is stated in the words “alternatively.”

original: de las kyang zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: de las kyang zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa las kyang ngo //
translated: “From that” means from manifestation.

original: 'khrul pa yin na mngon du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yin na mngon du byed pa yin no //
translated: If there is error, there is manifestation.

original: des na 'khrul pa zla ba gnyis su snang ba rnam par rtog pa med pa yin yang mngon du byed pa ma yin pas de mngon sum du gal 'gyur /
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa zla ba gnyis su snang ba rnam par rtog pa med pa yin yang mngon du byed pa ma yin pas de mngon sum du gal 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, even though the non-conceptual error of the appearance of two moons is manifested, it is not manifested directly.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni 'khrul pa nyid yin pa'i phyir spang bar 'gyur ro zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni 'khrul pa nyid yin pa'i phyir spang bar 'gyur ro zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: The thought is: If it is conceptual, then it is mistaken, and so is to be abandoned.

original: gal te 'di'i 'dod pas ma 'khrul pa zhes pa'i tshig mi slu ba'i don yin pa de lta na yang slob dpon chos mchog gi lugs kyis grub pa'i mtha' gsungs pa ni ma yin te zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di'i 'dod pas ma 'khrul pa zhes pa'i tshig mi slu ba'i don yin pa de lta na yang slob dpon chos mchog gi lugs kyis grub pa'i mtha' gsungs pa ni ma yin te zhes bya'o //
translated: Even if the word non-mistaken means non-deceptive, as he wishes, still it does not express the tenets of the master Dharmottara.

original: gang gis gzhan gyi lugs la ltos pa'i mtshan nyid la ma 'grul ba nyid med pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gis gzhan gyi lugs la ltos pa'i mtshan nyid la ma 'grul ba nyid med pa yin te /
translated: This is because in his system there is no non-mistakenness in terms of the characteristic that depends on the other.

original: mngon sum rtog pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba tsam zhig gsungs pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: mngon sum rtog pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba tsam zhig gsungs pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: This is because he says only that perception is free from conceptuality.

original: / des nam 'khrul ba'i tshig med pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa ji ltar gcod snyam na /
analyzed: / des nam 'khrul ba'i tshig med pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa ji ltar gcod snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, How can non-mistakenness eliminate conceptuality?

original: 'khrul pa med pa nyid du zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa nyid du zhes gsungs so //
translated: he says non-mistakenness.

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos so //
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos so //
translated: The master Dignāga.🔽Exception means

original: dmigs kyis bsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “with the exception of” refers to the following.

original: mngon sum ltar snang rab rib bcas zhes dmigs kyi bsal ba'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: mngon sum ltar snang rab rib bcas zhes dmigs kyi bsal ba'i sgo nas so //
translated: The word as indicates that the object is like a direct perception, but is not a direct perception, because it is accompanied by a cataract.

original: de ltar na re zhig rnam par rtog pa med ba'i tshig gis mngon du byed pa nyid nyid nye bar mtshon nas bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig rnam par rtog pa med ba'i tshig gis mngon du byed pa nyid nyid nye bar mtshon nas bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the word non-conceptual indicates the very manifestation of the object, and the words the object of knowledge indicate the object to be established and the means of establishment.

original: de nyid rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas sam mngon du byed pa nyid brjod pa yin no zhes ston pas gang na zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas sam mngon du byed pa nyid brjod pa yin no zhes ston pas gang na zhes gsungs so //
translated: The word where indicates that the object is manifested in another way, or that it is manifested.

original: dbang @163b la brten pa nyid des na'o //
analyzed: dbang @163b la brten pa nyid des na'o //
translated: It is because it is based on the sense faculty.

original: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mngon sum gyi tshig nyid kyis mngon du byed pa nyid brjod pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mngon sum gyi tshig nyid kyis mngon du byed pa nyid brjod pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The word or indicates that the word direct perception itself expresses the manifestation of the object.

original: des na bya ba ni mngon sum nyid kyis na'o //
analyzed: des na bya ba ni mngon sum nyid kyis na'o //
translated: Therefore, the word because indicates the direct perception itself.

original: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par rtog pa med pas zhes bya ba 'di 'ba' zhig nyid rnal 'byor spyod pa pa'i lugs kyis mtshan nyid du brjod du brjod pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par rtog pa med pas zhes bya ba 'di 'ba' zhig nyid rnal 'byor spyod pa pa'i lugs kyis mtshan nyid du brjod du brjod pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The phrase or else and so on indicates that the Yogacara school declares that the absence of conceptual differentiation is the characteristic of direct perception.

original: 'dir brtsad pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir brtsad pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word but introduces a discussion.

original: mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba ni lan brjod pa'o //🔽gal te 'ga' zhig 'khrul pas mngon sum yin pa yod na ni //
analyzed: mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba ni lan brjod pa'o // gal te 'ga' zhig 'khrul pas mngon sum yin pa yod na ni //
translated: The phrase is not direct perception is the response.

original: de gcad pa zhig na de lta bu ni srid pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de gcad pa zhig na de lta bu ni srid pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: If there were any direct perception that was mistaken, then it could be refuted. But that is not possible. This is the idea.

original: 'o na phyi rol la yang de mngon sum ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na phyi rol la yang de mngon sum ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then why is external direct perception not accepted?

original: snang ba'i rang bzhin las zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: snang ba'i rang bzhin las zhes gsungs so //
translated: The phrase because it is the nature of appearance is stated.

original: 'dir ni phyi rol pa ni tshang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni phyi rol pa ni tshang ma yin te /
translated: Here, the word external is not a proper name.

original: rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir zhes bstan to /
analyzed: rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir zhes bstan to /
translated: It is taught that because it is the nature of conceptualization.

original: 'khrul pa nyid 'dod pa'i shes pa ni yid kyi 'khrul pa gang yin pa de'i yul can yin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid yin gyi don dam par de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid 'dod pa'i shes pa ni yid kyi 'khrul pa gang yin pa de'i yul can yin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid yin gyi don dam par de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The consciousness that is the desire for error is error itself, because it is the subject of the error of the mind. But ultimately, it does not exist.

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam pa gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du grub pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam pa gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du grub pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: In the line beginning with “other,” etc., he states the establishment of the nonexistence of the conceptual differentiation of the aspect.

original: thams cad du yang sbyor ba mi srid do zhes ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad du yang sbyor ba mi srid do zhes ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the line beginning with “thus,” etc., he shows that the application is not possible in any way.

original: gyur du chug kyang zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: gyur du chug kyang zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba zhes 'brel to //
translated: In the line beginning with “even if,” etc., he connects the application.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni so sor snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni so sor snang ba'o //
translated: In the line beginning with “this,” etc., he refers to the individual appearances.

original: 'di nyid brjod pa ni rigs dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid brjod pa ni rigs dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He states this very thing in the line beginning with “the family,” etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ni zhes bya ba ni tha dad par snang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ni zhes bya ba ni tha dad par snang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: In the line beginning with “therefore,” etc., he refers to the nonexistence of the appearance of difference.

original: de ltar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'dres par snang bar ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'dres par snang bar ro //
translated: In the line beginning with “thus,” etc., he refers to the appearance of the mixture.

original: rang bzhin tha dad pa kho na'i phyir snang ba tha dad par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad pa kho na'i phyir snang ba tha dad par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Because they are different by intrinsic reality, they are different in appearance.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni tha dad par ro //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni tha dad par ro //
translated: “Thus” means as different.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus tha dad pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus tha dad pa la'o //
translated: “In that” means in different places and times.

original: rlung dang nyi ma dag ces bya ba ni tshad mas grub pa'i dpe'o //
analyzed: rlung dang nyi ma dag ces bya ba ni tshad mas grub pa'i dpe'o //
translated: “Wind and sun” are examples established by valid cognition.

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni spyi la sogs pa gcig tu mngon par 'dod pa dag la yang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni spyi la sogs pa gcig tu mngon par 'dod pa dag la yang ngo //
translated: “Everywhere” means also in the case of the one that is asserted as a universal and so on.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres par ro //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres par ro //
translated: “Thus” means as mixed into one.

original: du pa'i stobs kyis yon tan dang bya ba la sogs pa rnams tha dad pa mi snang ba yin no zhes rtog par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du pa'i stobs kyis yon tan dang bya ba la sogs pa rnams tha dad pa mi snang ba yin no zhes rtog par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It follows that the qualities, actions, and so on, by the power of the many, would not appear as different.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni chu la sogs par snang yang chu tsam gyi sgrub byed du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni chu la sogs par snang yang chu tsam gyi sgrub byed du mi 'gyur te /
translated: “Everything” means that even though it appears in water and so on, the mere appearance of water is not a proof.

original: me la sogs pa dag kyang gcig tu 'dres nas snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me la sogs pa dag kyang gcig tu 'dres nas snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because fire and so on also appear mixed into one.

original: gal te ba lang @164a * //
analyzed: gal te ba lang @164a * //
translated: If it is a cow,

original: zhes rtogs pa la de'i khyad par gang yin zhes dris pa na /
analyzed: zhes rtogs pa la de'i khyad par gang yin zhes dris pa na /
translated: If you ask what is the difference between the two,

original: dbyug pa bzhin du tha dad par ci ste mi brjod snyam na /
analyzed: dbyug pa bzhin du tha dad par ci ste mi brjod snyam na /
translated: why not say that the man with the stick is different from the stick?

original: de ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “This is it” means “this is the man with the stick.”

original: gzhan dag dpe yang mi 'thad par byed pa ni dbyug pa can bya'o zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni dbyug pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag dpe yang mi 'thad par byed pa ni dbyug pa can bya'o zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni dbyug pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Others say that the example is not valid, so the phrase “the man with the stick” is used to anticipate that objection.

original: gal te dbyug pa mi snang na de'i tshe sngar nyid dbyug pa can du ci ste mi rtogs she na /
analyzed: gal te dbyug pa mi snang na de'i tshe sngar nyid dbyug pa can du ci ste mi rtogs she na /
translated: If the stick does not appear, then why not understand the man with the stick as he was before?

original: gzhan lan 'debs pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan lan 'debs pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is “not from another.”

original: gal te tshogs pa yod kyang ci de khyad par can nyid don gzhan kho na yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa yod kyang ci de khyad par can nyid don gzhan kho na yin nam zhe na /
translated: If the collection exists, then why is it that the man with the stick is not just another object?

original: skyes la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: skyes la zhes gsungs so //
translated: The reply is “when it has arisen.”

original: khyad par can de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par can de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the man with the stick is not understood.

original: gal te der dbyig pa yang snang na ci nyes she na /
analyzed: gal te der dbyig pa yang snang na ci nyes she na /
translated: If the stick appears there, what is the problem?

original: gal te dbyig pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te dbyig pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is “if the stick.”

original: grub pa'i mtha' gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' gsungs pa ni //
translated: The conclusion is stated:

original: de thams cad ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de thams cad ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “All of that” is the same as “all of that which is not understood.”

original: gal te skyes bu 'ga' zhig snang na ni de'i tshe gang zhig rtogs pa ma yin pa de la de skad ces brjod de de ni khyad par nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te skyes bu 'ga' zhig snang na ni de'i tshe gang zhig rtogs pa ma yin pa de la de skad ces brjod de de ni khyad par nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: If a man is perceived, then at that time, that which is not understood is called “that.” It would not be a distinction,

original: rtog pa kho na khyad par yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtog pa kho na khyad par yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because the distinction is only the understanding.

original: khyad par ma bzung bar khyad par can blo mi skye'o zhes bya ba lugs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par ma bzung bar khyad par can blo mi skye'o zhes bya ba lugs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The system is that the cognition of the distinguished object does not arise without the apprehension of the distinction.

original: gal te dbyig pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rtogs pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dbyig pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rtogs pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: If the distinction, such as the stick, is understood,

original: de ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: then the verse says, “If that . . . ”

original: 'dis ni gang du yang ji ltar yang khyad par can gyi dngos po mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni gang du yang ji ltar yang khyad par can gyi dngos po mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows that the distinguished object is not tenable in any way whatsoever.

original: 'ba' zhig la zhes bya ba ni skyes bu la'o //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig la zhes bya ba ni skyes bu la'o //
translated: “Alone” refers to the man.

original: dbyig pa can zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa la yang khyad par can nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dbyig pa can zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa la yang khyad par can nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The cognition of the man with the stick would not be the cognition of the distinguished object,

original: khyad par mi snang na skyes bu 'ba' zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par mi snang na skyes bu 'ba' zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if the distinction is not perceived, the man alone is perceived.

original: 'on te gang gis de la rtogs na /
analyzed: 'on te gang gis de la rtogs na /
translated: But if it is understood by means of that,

original: khyad par can nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur ba dbyig pa ni khyad par can ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par can nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur ba dbyig pa ni khyad par can ma yin no //
translated: then the stick is not the distinctive feature, since it is not understood as distinctive.

original: 'on kyang khyad par can gyi blo'i yul gang yin pa'i dngos po de nyid yin no zhes ston pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang khyad par can gyi blo'i yul gang yin pa'i dngos po de nyid yin no zhes ston pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But it is the very thing that is the object of the cognition of the distinctive feature.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas 'di la brjod pa ni zhes rnam par rtog pa mdzad nas phyogs dang po sel ba ni /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas 'di la brjod pa ni zhes rnam par rtog pa mdzad nas phyogs dang po sel ba ni /
translated: The proponent of the conclusion says this, and then, having formulated the doubt, he rejects the first alternative:

original: bde ba la sogs zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs zhes gsungs so //
translated: “If pleasure, etc.”

original: gang gi tshe sngon po la sogs pa nye ba las bde ba sogs pa'i rang bzhin sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa skye ba de'i tshe rnam par shes pa la rang la brten pa'i khyad par yod pa des na ci de rnam par rtog pa
analyzed: gang gi tshe sngon po la sogs pa nye ba las bde ba sogs pa'i rang bzhin sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa skye ba de'i tshe rnam par shes pa la rang la brten pa'i khyad par yod pa des na ci de rnam par rtog pa
translated: When pleasure, etc. arise from the presence of blue, etc., the consciousness of blue, etc. has the nature of pleasure, etc. At that time, does the consciousness become conceptual because it has a distinctive feature that is based on itself?

original: dang bcas par 'gyur ram zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dang bcas par 'gyur ram zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The second alternative is rejected:🔽“If it does not arise from that, then how can it be the cognition of that?”

original: gal te bde ba la sogs pa'i khyad par de yul gyi ma yin na de'i che yul med @164b bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te bde ba la sogs pa'i khyad par de yul gyi ma yin na de'i che yul med @164b bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: If that distinction of pleasure, etc. is not of the object, then there is no object of that, etc.

original: 'di la la ni ma yin te bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la la ni ma yin te bya ba'o //
translated: Here, some say it is not so, but it is an action.

original: rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa la brjod pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa la brjod pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the second conception, it is said, “distinction.”

original: 'on te khyed dbyug pa can gyi rtogs pa yul med pa nyid du 'dod na de nyid ltar dngos po gnyis ka'i yul can yin zhes brjod snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te khyed dbyug pa can gyi rtogs pa yul med pa nyid du 'dod na de nyid ltar dngos po gnyis ka'i yul can yin zhes brjod snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the cognition of the club-man is asserted to be without an object, then just like that, it has an object of both things.

original: gnyis ka yang zhes gsungs te ;
analyzed: gnyis ka yang zhes gsungs te ;
translated: In response to that, it is said, “Both.”

original: dbyug pa dang skyes bu gnyis ka'o //
analyzed: dbyug pa dang skyes bu gnyis ka'o //
translated: Both the club and the man.

original: tha snyad tsam zhes bya ba ni lhag par zhen pa tsam mo //
analyzed: tha snyad tsam zhes bya ba ni lhag par zhen pa tsam mo //
translated: “Mere convention” is mere adherence.

original: gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis smras pas so //
analyzed: gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis smras pas so //
translated: “Both” is spoken by another.

original: dbyugs pa dang skyes bu gnyis ka'i'o //
analyzed: dbyugs pa dang skyes bu gnyis ka'i'o //
translated: Both the club and the man.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' ste gcig gi tshig dang gnyis kyi tshigs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' ste gcig gi tshig dang gnyis kyi tshigs la sogs pa'o //
translated: “This” is the tenet, the words of one, two, etc.

original: tha snyad tsam nyid bsgrub pa ni gtso po ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tha snyad tsam nyid bsgrub pa ni gtso po ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mere conventional is being established, not the principal one.

original: de ni zhes bya ba khyad par ro //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba khyad par ro //
translated: This is the distinction.

original: 'di nyid bzhad gad du byed pa 'dra bar gsungs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid bzhad gad du byed pa 'dra bar gsungs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is said to be like a joke: “If” means “if it were so.”

original: gcig gi tshig bstan pa 'dis ni'o //
analyzed: gcig gi tshig bstan pa 'dis ni'o //
translated: This is shown by the word “only.”

original: dbyug pa snang ba ni yod pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbyug pa snang ba ni yod pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the appearance of the stick is only existent.🔽The distinction must be completed without fail.

original: khyad par gdon mi za bar rdzogs par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni bzod pas gzhan dag smra ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par gdon mi za bar rdzogs par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni bzod pas gzhan dag smra ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent says, “Why?”

original: bum ba dang snam bu la sogs pa'i yul dang dus sogs khyad par can rnams dang / dus la sogs pa dang bral ba 'ba' zhig snang ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: bum ba dang snam bu la sogs pa'i yul dang dus sogs khyad par can rnams dang / dus la sogs pa dang bral ba 'ba' zhig snang ba nyid yin te /
translated: The objects such as pots and cloth, etc., and the distinctions of place and time, etc., and the mere appearances that are devoid of time, etc.,

original: 'dir yul dang dus ni rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir yul dang dus ni rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: are not understood here as place and time.

original: de la yang shes pa'i khyad par can nyid ni mi snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de la yang shes pa'i khyad par can nyid ni mi snang ba ma yin te /
translated: The distinction of consciousness is not nonapparent.

original: snang ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: snang ba nyid yin no //
translated: It is apparent.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra ba rnam par rtog par mdzad pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni don gzhan dang 'brel pa khyad par can yin no //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra ba rnam par rtog par mdzad pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni don gzhan dang 'brel pa khyad par can yin no //
translated: The term “distinction” in the phrase “the assertion of a distinction” means a particular connection with another object.

original: don gyi rang bzhin mi mthun pa nyid khyad par can yin //
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin mi mthun pa nyid khyad par can yin //
translated: The term “distinction” in the phrase “distinction of the nature of the object” means a difference in nature.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni phyogs gnyis ka la yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni phyogs gnyis ka la yang ngo //
translated: The phrase “at that time” refers to both alternatives.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni don gzhan dang 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par can ni snga ma dang phyi ma la sogs pa'i shes pa la snang ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa'i bum pa la sogs pa'i de la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni don gzhan dang 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par can ni snga ma dang phyi ma la sogs pa'i shes pa la snang ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa'i bum pa la sogs pa'i de la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The term “that” refers to the distinction that has the nature of a connection with another object. It does not exist in a pot, etc., which have the nature of being the objects of cognition of a prior and subsequent moment.

original: bum pa la sogs pa snang ba la ni dus la sogs par yang snang bar nyams su myong bar byed do //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa snang ba la ni dus la sogs par yang snang bar nyams su myong bar byed do //
translated: In the case of the appearance of a pot, etc., one experiences the appearance of time, etc.

original: rnam par rtog pa gnyis brjes su brjod nas sun 'byin pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gnyis brjes su brjod nas sun 'byin pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression “why not?” is a reductio argument that exchanges the two terms of a hypothetical position.

original: nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni mi 'dra ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni mi 'dra ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression “the difference” refers to the statement of another fault.

original: sngar so sor mthong ba de nyid sbyor ba gang gi sngon du 'gro ba de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar so sor mthong ba de nyid sbyor ba gang gi sngon du 'gro ba de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: That very seeing of the individual is the antecedent of the application, and that is what is meant by this.

original: de bas na rigs la sogs pa khyad par yin yang rigs la sogs pa de yang gdon mi za ba snang bar @165a * //🔽'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de bas na rigs la sogs pa khyad par yin yang rigs la sogs pa de yang gdon mi za ba snang bar @165a * // 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, even though the class, etc. are the distinctions, that class, etc. must appear,

original: de lta ma yin na sbyor ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na sbyor ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because otherwise the application would be untenable.

original: sgra dang gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ba lang zhes bya ba ni ba lang zhes bya ba'i sgra dang tshig gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis gsal ba ste de dag snang ba'o //
analyzed: sgra dang gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ba lang zhes bya ba ni ba lang zhes bya ba'i sgra dang tshig gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis gsal ba ste de dag snang ba'o //
translated: Sound and manifestation are the cow, the sound and the manifestation of the word and the sentence, “cow,” are the cow.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa la'o //
translated: Here means in the cognition of the universal.

original: ming tsam dang 'brel pa nyid brjod pa ni 'di yang zhes bya ba'o zhes rnam pa 'dis ming sgra dang bzhon pa dang / bzhon pa la sogs pa'i don bya ba mtshungs pa yin no //
