analyzed: ming tsam dang 'brel pa nyid brjod pa ni 'di yang zhes bya ba'o zhes rnam pa 'dis ming sgra dang bzhon pa dang / bzhon pa la sogs pa'i don bya ba mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: The mere name is related to it, and that is what is meant by this. In this way, the name, the sound, and the word are similar in the function of the object.

original: don ni 'ga' zhig gi yang zhes bya ba ni bzhon pa la sogs pa'i yang ste /
analyzed: don ni 'ga' zhig gi yang zhes bya ba ni bzhon pa la sogs pa'i yang ste /
translated: The meaning of “some” is that of a vehicle, etc.

original: de yang gsal ba so sor tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang gsal ba so sor tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is also because of the individual differences of the manifest.

original: rnam pa ni rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa ni rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'o //
translated: The aspect is the appearance in the conceptualization.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa yang ngo //
translated: And that, he says, is the aspect.

original: so sor nges pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin nyid brjod pa ni ba lang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin nyid brjod pa ni ba lang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The nature of the conceptualization of individual determination is expressed by the word “cow.”

original: rnam pa gcig ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad rtogs pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gcig ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad rtogs pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The thought is that one aspect is not the realization of all conceptualizations.

original: des na rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa de ni spyi'i rnam par rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa de ni spyi'i rnam par rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that aspect of conceptualization is not a universal conceptualization.

original: rnam pa gcig tu ni nyams su myong ba zhugs pa med de //
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu ni nyams su myong ba zhugs pa med de //
translated: In one aspect, there is no experience that enters.

original: des na dran pa yang de ltar mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na dran pa yang de ltar mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, memory is not tenable in that way. This is the meaning.

original: 'o na ji ltar spyi med par gsal ba thams cad sgra gcig gis brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar spyi med par gsal ba thams cad sgra gcig gis brjod ce na /
translated: Well, if there is no universal, how is it that all the individual things are expressed by one word?

original: sgras 'di ni zhes smos te /
analyzed: sgras 'di ni zhes smos te /
translated: The response is: “By the word this . . . ”

original: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra 'di na'o //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra 'di na'o //
translated: The word cow is used for the nine, heaven, etc.

original: mtho ris la sogs pa dgu la'o //
analyzed: mtho ris la sogs pa dgu la'o //
translated: The word cow is used for the nine, heaven, etc.

original: gal te yang da ltar gyi ni sgra don bcu la grags pa de lta na yang sngon gyi grags pa la ltos na de skad brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te yang da ltar gyi ni sgra don bcu la grags pa de lta na yang sngon gyi grags pa la ltos na de skad brjod pa yin no //
translated: Even though the ten meanings of the word cow are well known in the present, it is said in this way in consideration of the well known usage of the past.

original: don dug po de dag la ni rjes 'gro ba gcig yod pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: don dug po de dag la ni rjes 'gro ba gcig yod pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The ten meanings do not have a single universal.

original: brda byed pas byed pa gang yin pa dang / nyan pas nyan pa gang yin ba de dag gi yul gyi brda'o //
analyzed: brda byed pas byed pa gang yin pa dang / nyan pas nyan pa gang yin ba de dag gi yul gyi brda'o //
translated: The word is the object of the speaker's speech and the listener's hearing.

original: 'di yang khas blangs nas brjod par zad de /
analyzed: 'di yang khas blangs nas brjod par zad de /
translated: This is said by accepting the opponent's position.

original: don dam par ni gang la sogs pa de dag gi nang gi dbye la stos te mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par ni gang la sogs pa de dag gi nang gi dbye la stos te mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the ultimate, the word cow is not a universal because it is limitless in terms of the internal divisions of each individual cow.

original: 'di ni mi gsal ba'i rnam pa spyi'i rang bzhin yin yang dbang po shes pa la mi snang ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: 'di ni mi gsal ba'i rnam pa spyi'i rang bzhin yin yang dbang po shes pa la mi snang ba'i phyir na /
translated: Even though the universal is a general nature that is not clear, it does not appear to the sense consciousness.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore it is taught that it is only nonconceptual.

original: sngon gyi mi gsal ba gang yin ba de yid ni gsal ba 'di yin no zhes ngo shes pa las gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag gcig nyid yin te des na gsal bas snang ba nyid spyir snang ba yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi mi gsal ba gang yin ba de yid ni gsal ba 'di yin no zhes ngo shes pa las gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag gcig nyid yin te des na gsal bas snang ba nyid spyir snang ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the clear and the unclear are one. Therefore, the clear consciousness is the appearance in general.

original: de lta na yang dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do zhes brjod @165b pa ni de nyid 'di'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do zhes brjod @165b pa ni de nyid 'di'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In this way, the statement that the sense consciousness is conceptual is explained.

original: rgyu tha dad pa bshad pa ni mig la sogs pas ni dbang po'i shes pa skyed la /
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa bshad pa ni mig la sogs pas ni dbang po'i shes pa skyed la /
translated: The explanation of the different causes is that the eye and so on give rise to the sense consciousness,

original: bag chags kyis ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags kyis ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: while latent propensities give rise to the aspect of conceptualization.

original: 'dis ni chos 'gal ba gnas pa dang / rgyu tha dad par bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos 'gal ba gnas pa dang / rgyu tha dad par bstan to //
translated: This shows that contradictory phenomena can coexist and have different causes.

original: rnam pa'i zhes bya ba ni gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi'o //
analyzed: rnam pa'i zhes bya ba ni gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi'o //
translated: Aspect refers to the nature of the clear and unclear.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i shes pa dang rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi blo'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i shes pa dang rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi blo'o //
translated: That refers to the sense consciousness and the mind that has the character of conceptualization.

original: 'du ba gsal ba'i don du gzhan gyi lugs 'gog pa ni //
analyzed: 'du ba gsal ba'i don du gzhan gyi lugs 'gog pa ni //
translated: The refutation of the other’s position is for the sake of clarifying the point.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ If” is said.

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba yod med des mi 'grub snyam na /
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba yod med des mi 'grub snyam na /
translated: If one thinks that the existence or non-existence of the contact of the sense faculty and object is not established,

original: rigs la sogs pa zhes smras so//'phrod pa 'du ba mngon sum gyis ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa zhes smras so//'phrod pa 'du ba mngon sum gyis ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: he says “genus, etc.” Contact is not perceived by direct perception.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: “ Well then, what?”

original: snal ma 'di rnams la sna ma bu'o zhes bya ba la sogs par shes pa las so zhes gzhan gyi smras pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snal ma 'di rnams la sna ma bu'o zhes bya ba la sogs par shes pa las so zhes gzhan gyi smras pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The other says, “It is from the cognition ‘These threads have a cloth as their effect,’ etc.” “ Why?” is said.

original: 'jig rten 'gar yang ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'gar yang ngo //
translated: “ Somewhere in the world” is said.

original: de med pas zhes bya ba ni 'di la'o zhes bya ba'o blo med pas so //
analyzed: de med pas zhes bya ba ni 'di la'o zhes bya ba'o blo med pas so //
translated: “ Because of the absence of that” is said. “ Because of the absence of the cognition ‘This is it,’ the cognition ‘This is a cow’ is not produced.”

original: gal te blo 'di nyid kyis 'phrod pa 'du ba 'grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te blo 'di nyid kyis 'phrod pa 'du ba 'grub pa'i phyir /
translated: If the contact of the sense faculty and object is established by this very cognition,

original: de la bcad pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de la bcad pa ci yod ce na /
translated: what is the point of the refutation?

original: lkog shal la sogs pa zhes gsungs te /🔽de la ni ba lang la'o //
analyzed: lkog shal la sogs pa zhes gsungs te / de la ni ba lang la'o //
translated: “ The dewlap, etc.” is said.🔽“ In that” is in the cow.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni ba lang ngo //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni ba lang ngo //
translated: “ That” is the cow.

original: de dag la ni lkog shal la sogs pa dag la'o //
analyzed: de dag la ni lkog shal la sogs pa dag la'o //
translated: “ In those” is in the dewlap, etc.

original: yan lag lhag ma dag la zhes bya ba ni ris las gzhan pa'i yang lag la ba lang zhes rten nyid du rtogs na'o //
analyzed: yan lag lhag ma dag la zhes bya ba ni ris las gzhan pa'i yang lag la ba lang zhes rten nyid du rtogs na'o //
translated: The remaining parts are the basis, if one understands the cow to be the basis.

original: yang ji ltar na yan lag lhag ma rten nyid dang / rva ni brten pa nyid du rtog gi //
analyzed: yang ji ltar na yan lag lhag ma rten nyid dang / rva ni brten pa nyid du rtog gi //
translated: But how can the remaining parts be the basis and the horn be what is based on them?

original: don dam par ni 'di yod pa ma yin zhe na //
analyzed: don dam par ni 'di yod pa ma yin zhe na //
translated: In reality, this is not so.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, it is said:

original: de'i phyir 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni snal ma ni phyis 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni snal ma ni phyis 'byung ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the cloth is the later arising.

original: du ba dang me la sogs pa dus tha dad pa dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'ba' zhig nyid dam /
analyzed: du ba dang me la sogs pa dus tha dad pa dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'ba' zhig nyid dam /
translated: Smoke and fire, which are different in time, are only the relation of cause and effect.

original: spyi bo skyes dang du ba dag ni 'brel pa med par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi bo skyes dang du ba dag ni 'brel pa med par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: But the peak of existence and smoke would be unrelated.

original: gal te rgya shug ltung ba khar gzhong gi gnas par byed pas gnas brten brjod pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rgya shug ltung ba khar gzhong gi gnas par byed pas gnas brten brjod pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the falling jujube is not said to be the basis because it is caused to remain in the place of the bowl,

original: gnas ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gnas ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is said: “The basis is not the cause of remaining.

original: rgya shug de'i rnag bzhin gyi khyad par las gnas pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgya shug de'i rnag bzhin gyi khyad par las gnas pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no other remaining apart from the particular remaining of the jujube.

original: des na gnas pa byas na rgya shug nyid byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gnas pa byas na rgya shug nyid byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if it is a case of abiding, it is a case of the jujube fruit.

original: shes pa des / na brten pa'i dngos po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu kho na yin no //
analyzed: shes pa des / na brten pa'i dngos po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu kho na yin no //
translated: The object that is the basis of that cognition is only cause and effect.

original: snal ma dang snam bu dag kyang de kho na ltar rten dang brten par 'gyur ro zhes na /
analyzed: snal ma dang snam bu dag kyang de kho na ltar rten dang brten par 'gyur ro zhes na /
translated: Cloth and thread are just like that, they are the basis and what is based on the basis.

original: snal ma dang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: snal ma dang zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, “Thread and . . . ”

original: rgyu'i rang bzhin 'bras bu la sgro btags pas so //🔽shes ba sgro btags @166a * //
analyzed: rgyu'i rang bzhin 'bras bu la sgro btags pas so // shes ba sgro btags @166a * //
translated: Because the nature of the cause is superimposed on the effect.🔽It is from the superimposition of cognition.

original: pa las yin no zhes ji ltar shes she na /
analyzed: pa las yin no zhes ji ltar shes she na /
translated: How do you know that?

original: 'di ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar gsungs so //
translated: He says, “It is not like that. . . ”

original: de lta ma yin te gal te der rgyu sgro 'dogs pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang de'i tshe nyid snal ma yod pa yin na /🔽de'i tshe sngar gyi gnas skabs ma mthong ba yang snal ma de dag ni 'di'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin te gal te der rgyu sgro 'dogs pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang de'i tshe nyid snal ma yod pa yin na / de'i tshe sngar gyi gnas skabs ma mthong ba yang snal ma de dag ni 'di'o //
translated: If the cause is not superimposed there, but rather the thread exists at that time,

original: zhes shes par 'gyur na /
analyzed: zhes shes par 'gyur na /
translated: then at that time, without seeing the previous state, one would know, “Those threads are here.”

original: 'gyur pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gyur pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But that does not happen.

original: des na rgyu btags pa kho nas shes pa 'dir 'gyur ro zhes rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: des na rgyu btags pa kho nas shes pa 'dir 'gyur ro zhes rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is understood that this cognition is only from the superimposition of the cause.

original: de ltar na 'bras bu'i gnas skabs na snal ma med do zhes brjod pa nas snal ma las tha dad ba'i snam bu la med do zhes brjod pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar na 'bras bu'i gnas skabs na snal ma med do zhes brjod pa nas snal ma las tha dad ba'i snam bu la med do zhes brjod pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the statement “In the state of effect, the thread does not exist” up to the statement “In the cloth that is different from the thread, it does not exist” is “alternatively.”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni snam bu tha dad pa yod pa ma yin pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni snam bu tha dad pa yod pa ma yin pas na'o //
translated: “ Therefore” means because the cloth that is different does not exist.

original: rang bzhin gcig la ni rten dang brten pa zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig la ni rten dang brten pa zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In the case of a single intrinsic nature, there is no such thing as a support and something supported.

original: phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid kyis bshad pa rtsom par byed pa ni de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid kyis bshad pa rtsom par byed pa ni de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The one who begins the explanation by the nature of the one who is benefited and the one who benefits is “in that case.”

original: ldan pa'i khyad par las zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsam pas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa'i khyad par las zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsam pas brjod pa yin no //
translated: “ From the distinction of possession” is an expression by the thought of another.

original: rnam chad dmigs su med pa nyid 'chad pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam chad dmigs su med pa nyid 'chad pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the non-apprehension of a discontinuity is “how?”

original: gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ Also elsewhere” means

original: rgyu mtshan med par yang ngo //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med par yang ngo //
translated: without a reason.

original: spyi'i rgyu mtshan nyid du ci ste mi 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: spyi'i rgyu mtshan nyid du ci ste mi 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “Why is it not a general reason?”

original: de las tha dad pa'i zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de las tha dad pa'i zhes gsungs te /
translated: “ From that, different” is stated.

original: khung bu ba las tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: khung bu ba las tha dad pa'o //
translated: It is different from the hole.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni dang po brda'i yul dngos po gang yin pa de dang 'dra bas na gang zhig de'i rang bzhin sgro btags pa de la 'jug pa gang yin pa re ni dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni dang po brda'i yul dngos po gang yin pa de dang 'dra bas na gang zhig de'i rang bzhin sgro btags pa de la 'jug pa gang yin pa re ni dngos po ma yin no //
translated: That which is the object of the convention, the thing, is not the same as that which is applied to it, the universal which is superimposed on it.

original: der blo ji ltar 'khrul zhe na //
analyzed: der blo ji ltar 'khrul zhe na //
translated: How is the mind mistaken with regard to that?

original: snal ma'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: snal ma'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: The line “the mind is mistaken with regard to the universal” is stated.

original: snal ma'i tshul ni 'dra ba la sogs pa la ltos pa'i 'bad pa med par de nyid las brda byed pa ste de med na'o //
analyzed: snal ma'i tshul ni 'dra ba la sogs pa la ltos pa'i 'bad pa med par de nyid las brda byed pa ste de med na'o //
translated: The mode of the universal is that it is the basis for the convention without effort, in dependence on similarity.

original: chos gzhan ni ba lang nyid las gzhan gtsang sbra med pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: chos gzhan ni ba lang nyid las gzhan gtsang sbra med pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
translated: Another property is the absence of purity, etc., which is different from the property of being a cow.

original: 'di rjes su 'brangs pas 'dra ba gang yin pa de las 'khrul ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di rjes su 'brangs pas 'dra ba gang yin pa de las 'khrul ba yin no //
translated: The mind is mistaken with regard to that universal which is similar to that, which is the universal that is the object of the convention, in dependence on another property.

original: gal te chos gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs pas ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te chos gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs pas ci bya zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “What is the use of following another property?”

original: de'i zhes gsungs ste /
analyzed: de'i zhes gsungs ste /
translated: The line “that is not the universal” is stated.

original: chos gzhan de'i rjes su 'brang bar ni ba lang la sogs pa de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: chos gzhan de'i rjes su 'brang bar ni ba lang la sogs pa de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: Following another property, the universal is not the same as the cow, etc., which is the basis for the convention.

original: gtsang sbra chung ba la sogs pa med na ni 'dra bar 'gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gtsang sbra chung ba la sogs pa med na ni 'dra bar 'gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: If there is no small amount of purity, etc., then it is not similar.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni ba lang gcig las ba lang gzhan la'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni ba lang gcig las ba lang gzhan la'o //
translated: “Other” means that which is different from one cow, another cow.

original: don 'chad pa ni khra bo la sogs pa mtshan nyid mi mthun pa dag la yang na lang ngo snyam pa'i blo'o //
analyzed: don 'chad pa ni khra bo la sogs pa mtshan nyid mi mthun pa dag la yang na lang ngo snyam pa'i blo'o //
translated: The explanation of the meaning is that even in the case of different characteristics, such as a cow with spots, there is the cognition “cow.”

original: de la zhes bya ba'i ba lang ngo snyam pa'i @166b blo skye ba la yang mtshungs ba'i ba lang nyid rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'i ba lang ngo snyam pa'i @166b blo skye ba la yang mtshungs ba'i ba lang nyid rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
translated: In the case of the arising of the cognition “cow” in regard to that, the cause is the similarity of being a cow.

original: 'di ni lan du mi rung ste zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni lan du mi rung ste zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said that this is not a proper response.

original: gal te dper na dbyug pa can zhes bya bar rtog pa nyid kun rdzob pa'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa de bzhin du ba lang gi shes pa yang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dper na dbyug pa can zhes bya bar rtog pa nyid kun rdzob pa'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa de bzhin du ba lang gi shes pa yang yin no zhe na /
translated: If, for example, the conception of a staff-holder is not the basis of the conventional, then the cognition of a cow is not either.

original: 'di ltar zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said, “In this way.”

original: de ltar ma yin zhes bya ba ni gal te dbyig pa rgyu mtshan yin na /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin zhes bya ba ni gal te dbyig pa rgyu mtshan yin na /
translated: “Not so” means that if the staff is the basis,

original: de'i tshig gcig na gnas pa'i dbyug pa nyid kyis thams cad dbyug pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshig gcig na gnas pa'i dbyug pa nyid kyis thams cad dbyug pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: and by the mere presence of the word “staff” in that expression, everything would be a “staffer.”

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba la yang ngo //
translated: “ In that” means in the connection.

original: ci ste dbyug pa la 'brel ba med pa kho nar dbyug pa ni 'brel ba can yin no zhes rtogs na de lta yin na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ste dbyug pa la 'brel ba med pa kho nar dbyug pa ni 'brel ba can yin no zhes rtogs na de lta yin na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that the staff is the connected one, without any connection to the staff, then “in that case.”

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni kun rdzob pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni kun rdzob pa nyid du'o //
translated: “ That itself” means as a conventional reality.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ From that” means

original: dbyug pa las tha dad pa'i'o //
analyzed: dbyug pa las tha dad pa'i'o //
translated: from the staff.

original: 'on te gnyis po de nyid las 'byor bar brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'on te gnyis po de nyid las 'byor bar brjod ce na /
translated: But if you say that the connection is expressed from that itself,

original: gnyis po tsam zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gnyis po tsam zhes gsungs so //
translated: then “mere duality” is stated.

original: phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po ji ltar kun rdzob ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po ji ltar kun rdzob ma yin zhe na /
translated: How can the thing that is helpful not be conventional?

original: de yang zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: de yang zhes gsungs so ;
translated: “ That also” is stated.

original: / gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir khyad par can gyi rtog pa ni 'ga' yang dbang po las byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: / gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir khyad par can gyi rtog pa ni 'ga' yang dbang po las byung ba ma yin no //
translated: Since that is so, therefore no conceptual distinguisher at all arises from the sense faculties.

original: de bzhin du pa lang nyid la sogs pa yang don dam pa kho na yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: de bzhin du pa lang nyid la sogs pa yang don dam pa kho na yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: In the same way, the universal, etc. are ultimately real.

original: rigs la sogs pa ni gsal ba las tha dad bar mi snang ba'i phyir na don dam par mi 'gyur ba ma yin na zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa ni gsal ba las tha dad bar mi snang ba'i phyir na don dam par mi 'gyur ba ma yin na zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The universal, etc. are not not ultimately real, because they do not appear to be different from the manifestation.

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba'i stobs kyis rigs la sogs pa tha dad par mi snang du chug mod /
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba'i stobs kyis rigs la sogs pa tha dad par mi snang du chug mod /
translated: One may say: 'Well, let the universal, etc. not appear to be different from the manifestation by the power of the coming together of the sense faculty, the object of sense and the consciousness.

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba nyid tha dad par ci ste mi snang zhe na /
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba nyid tha dad par ci ste mi snang zhe na /
translated: But why do not the coming together of the sense faculty, the object of sense and the consciousness themselves appear to be different?

original: brjod pa ni 'phrod pa 'du ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni 'phrod pa 'du ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: 'The coming together of the sense faculty, the object of sense and the consciousness'.

original: ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba ni ba lang nyid la sogs par rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba ni ba lang nyid la sogs par rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: 'The reason for the universal, etc.' means: the reason for the understanding of the universal, etc.

original: tha dad pa nyid la zhes bya ba ni phan tshun thad dad pas du ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i bzho ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid la zhes bya ba ni phan tshun thad dad pas du ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i bzho ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: 'In the difference' means: in the milking, etc. which is of a manifold nature by way of mutual difference.

original: phyed phyi ma 'chad pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma 'chad pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the second half of the verse begins with 'just as'.

original: de bzhin du ba lang nyid la yang 'dri na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ba lang nyid la yang 'dri na'o //
translated: Likewise, it is the same with regard to the question of cowness.

original: gal te rigs med na tha snyad 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rigs med na tha snyad 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If there is no universal, then the conventional would not occur.

original: rigs ni tha snyad kyis zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rigs ni tha snyad kyis zhes gsungs so //
translated: But it is said that the universal is by convention.

original: de'i tshe gzhan du yang de la zhes bya ba dngos pa la ma ltos par sgra mi 'jug par 'gyur na ltos pa med pa ni mthong ba yang dngos po med kyang sgra 'jug pas ni mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe gzhan du yang de la zhes bya ba dngos pa la ma ltos par sgra mi 'jug par 'gyur na ltos pa med pa ni mthong ba yang dngos po med kyang sgra 'jug pas ni mthong ba yin no //
translated: At that time, it would be impossible for the word to occur without depending on the other, the particular, but it is seen that the word occurs without the particular.

original: des na ba lang la sogs pa 'di la yang de kho na bzhin 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na ba lang la sogs pa 'di la yang de kho na bzhin 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is seen that the word occurs even when the thing does not exist. Thus, it is thought that this is the same with regard to cows and so on.

original: @167a * // gal te tshig don drug po rnams la dngos po nyid tha dad pa yod pa de nyid sgra'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: @167a * // gal te tshig don drug po rnams la dngos po nyid tha dad pa yod pa de nyid sgra'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
translated: If the six categories have a different thingness, that itself is the reason for the word.

original: rdzas la sogs pa'i zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rdzas la sogs pa'i zhes gsungs te /
translated: But it is said that substance and so on.

original: drug po 'di rnams nyid kyi nang nas gang rung zhig dngos po nyid du 'gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: drug po 'di rnams nyid kyi nang nas gang rung zhig dngos po nyid du 'gyur pa yin te /
translated: Among these six, one is thingness.

original: de lta ma yin na tshig gi don bdun par thal pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de lta ma yin na tshig gi don bdun par thal pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Otherwise, it would follow that there would be a seventh category.

original: / re zhig rdzas ma yin no zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: / re zhig rdzas ma yin no zhes bya ba'o /
translated: First, it is not a substance.

original: de bzhin du yon tan la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yon tan la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: And so on for qualities and so forth.

original: des kyang spyi sogs pa dang ldan pa'am 'du ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des kyang spyi sogs pa dang ldan pa'am 'du ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not possess universals, etc., nor do they combine.

original: khang bzangs kyis gra ni re zhig rdzas kyi rgyu mtshan can du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: khang bzangs kyis gra ni re zhig rdzas kyi rgyu mtshan can du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: First, a wall is the causal-sign of a substance.

original: khang bzangs kyang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: khang bzangs kyang zhes gsungs so //
translated: A wall is also not a substance.

original: rigs mi mthun pa'i yan lag gi rdzas mi rtsom pa'i phyir ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa'i yan lag gi rdzas mi rtsom pa'i phyir ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is not composed of substances of different types, it is a possessor.

original: de la bshad pa ni zhes gsungs pa //
analyzed: de la bshad pa ni zhes gsungs pa //
translated: The explanation of that is stated.

original: de phreng de ni ci zhig yin //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de phreng de ni ci zhig yin // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What is that garland?

original: rdzas dang yon tan dang las ni phreng ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzas dang yon tan dang las ni phreng ba ma yin no //
translated: Substances, qualities, and actions are not garlands.

original: so sor sel ba ni rdzas ni yon tan la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: so sor sel ba ni rdzas ni yon tan la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The individual is a substance, a quality, etc.

original: khang bzangs kyi mtshan nyid kyi ldan pa la'o ;
analyzed: khang bzangs kyi mtshan nyid kyi ldan pa la'o ;
translated: In the case of a wall, it is a possessor of the characteristics of a wall.

original: / ldan pa ni yon tan yin pas gang gis phreng ba de la 'du ba 'gyur ba yon tan la ni rdzas kyi 'du ba yod pa ma yin no //🔽yon tan la med pa nyid kyi phyir phreng ba yon tan yang ma yin no //
analyzed: / ldan pa ni yon tan yin pas gang gis phreng ba de la 'du ba 'gyur ba yon tan la ni rdzas kyi 'du ba yod pa ma yin no // yon tan la med pa nyid kyi phyir phreng ba yon tan yang ma yin no //
translated: since the possession is a quality, the garland does not exist as a substance in the quality in which it is found.🔽And the garland is not a quality, because it does not exist as a quality.

original: yon tan ni yon tan med pa yin no zhes bya ba lugs yin pa'i phyir na //
analyzed: yon tan ni yon tan med pa yin no zhes bya ba lugs yin pa'i phyir na //
translated: Since it is a rule that a quality is not a quality,

original: ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi khang bzangs yon tan la phreng ba med par ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi khang bzangs yon tan la phreng ba med par ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: how can the mansion, which is characterized by possession, be a garland?

original: phreng ba ni las kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: phreng ba ni las kyang ma yin te /
translated: The garland is not an action,

original: las ni rdzas la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las ni rdzas la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because an action is based on a substance.

original: yon tan la mi brten pa'i phyir dang / khang bzangs kyang yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan la mi brten pa'i phyir dang / khang bzangs kyang yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not based on a quality, and the mansion is a quality.

original: 'du ba dang khyad par ma yin te /
analyzed: 'du ba dang khyad par ma yin te /
translated: It is not a collection or a particularity,

original: de dag gi 'bras bu gang yin pa 'di la'o snyam pa'i blo dang phan tshun ldog pa'i blo de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi 'bras bu gang yin pa 'di la'o snyam pa'i blo dang phan tshun ldog pa'i blo de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no cognition of this as the result of those, nor of mutual exclusion.

original: yon tan la yang zhes bya ba ni ldan pa'i mtshan nyid khang bzangs la sogs pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: yon tan la yang zhes bya ba ni ldan pa'i mtshan nyid khang bzangs la sogs pa la yang ngo //
translated: “And in qualities” means in the characteristics of inherence, such as a house, etc.

original: de ltar khas len na zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa khas len na'o //
analyzed: de ltar khas len na zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa khas len na'o //
translated: “If you accept that” means if you accept that they are different.

original: mtshungs pa'i tha snyad don du zhes bya ba ni rigs rigs zhes bya ba thad snyad kyi don du'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i tha snyad don du zhes bya ba ni rigs rigs zhes bya ba thad snyad kyi don du'o //
translated: “For the sake of the convention of similarity” means for the sake of the convention of the word “class.”

original: der yang zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rigs rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rigs rnams la yang ngo //
translated: “In that case” means in the case of the classes of class.

original: tha snyad kyi zhes bya ba ni rigs zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: tha snyad kyi zhes bya ba ni rigs zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: “The convention” means the convention of the word “class.”

original: de'i phyir rtogs pa 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtogs pa 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: “Therefore, the understanding is not tenable.”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rtogs mtha' med pas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rtogs mtha' med pas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Because there is no end to the understanding.”

original: rgya mtshan mtha' med pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgya mtshan mtha' med pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no end to the ocean.

original: 'di nye bar btags pa nyid du @167b zhes bya ba ni phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad 'di'o //
analyzed: 'di nye bar btags pa nyid du @167b zhes bya ba ni phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad 'di'o //
translated: “This is just a designation” refers to the convention of a “great garland,” etc.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba nye bar btags par khas blangs par ro //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba nye bar btags par khas blangs par ro //
translated: “In that case” means if you accept that it is just a designation.

original: gal te nye bar btags pa nyid du ma gtogs mod //
analyzed: gal te nye bar btags pa nyid du ma gtogs mod //
translated: If it is not included in the mere designation,

original: de lta na yang don gzhan du 'gyur pa'i chen po nyid la sogs pa med pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa nyid do zhes bsams nas gzhan dag brjod pa ni chen po nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang don gzhan du 'gyur pa'i chen po nyid la sogs pa med pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa nyid do zhes bsams nas gzhan dag brjod pa ni chen po nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: then, since there is no greatness, etc. that are different objects, it is a mere designation.

original: gal zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gal zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dgongs pa'o //
translated: The word “if” is for the purpose of understanding.

original: 'on te nye bar btags pa rtogs pa yin no zhes brjod na //
analyzed: 'on te nye bar btags pa rtogs pa yin no zhes brjod na //
translated: But if it is said that the designation is understood,

original: de'i tshe med pa grub ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe med pa grub ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: then at that time, “the non-existent is established” and so on.

original: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni phreng ba chen po che rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni phreng ba chen po che rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: The characteristic of substance does not exist, because the understanding of greatness is a great garland.

original: chen po nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi yon tan yod pa'i ma yin no //
analyzed: chen po nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi yon tan yod pa'i ma yin no //
translated: The quality that has the characteristic of greatness does not exist.

original: yon tan la ltos na 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid kyang yin te /
analyzed: yon tan la ltos na 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid kyang yin te /
translated: In relation to the quality, it is also the cause of the composite,

original: des na rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: des na rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir //
translated: therefore, because it has the characteristic of substance,

original: phreng ba ni rdzas nyid du 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: phreng ba ni rdzas nyid du 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The rosary would be a substance.

original: bsdus pa mtshan nyid ma yin no / zhes bya ba 'di yang ji ltar shes snyam na /
analyzed: bsdus pa mtshan nyid ma yin no / zhes bya ba 'di yang ji ltar shes snyam na /
translated: How do we know that the collection is not the characteristic?

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Space, etc.

original: gal te zhes bya bas dogs pa bsu nas lan brjod pa ni rtog pa yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya bas dogs pa bsu nas lan brjod pa ni rtog pa yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o /
translated: If, anticipating this question, he says, “because of the existence of the idea,”

original: gnyis ka yang dgag pa ji lta zhe na //
analyzed: gnyis ka yang dgag pa ji lta zhe na //
translated: how can both be denied?

original: re zhig gtso bo ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: re zhig gtso bo ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: First, he says, “primordial matter,” etc.

original: nye bar btags pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba ni don gcig 'du ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba ni don gcig 'du ba'o //
translated: The reason for the designation is the collection of the one object.

original: de nyid ston par byed pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ston par byed pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He demonstrates just that, saying, “for example,” etc.

original: nags zhes bya ba ni grangs sam tshogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: nags zhes bya ba ni grangs sam tshogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The forest is the nature of the collection or aggregation.

original: phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don gcig la 'du ba yang med pa nyid de /
analyzed: phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don gcig la 'du ba yang med pa nyid de /
translated: The great rosary, etc., also do not have the nature of the collection of the one object.

original: khang bzangs la sogs pa ldan pa'i rang bzhin gang la phreng ba 'dus pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khang bzangs la sogs pa ldan pa'i rang bzhin gang la phreng ba 'dus pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The palace, etc., do not have the nature of the collection of the rosary, etc.

original: rgyu gzhan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa gzhan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa gzhan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Possessing another cause” means possessing another that is different.

original: srid pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni brtag par rung ba ma yin no //🔽rang gi ngo bo nyid 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: srid pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni brtag par rung ba ma yin no // rang gi ngo bo nyid 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no zhe na /
translated: “It is not possible” means it is not suitable to be imagined.🔽If it is the cause of engaging its own nature,

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid 'jug pa'i rgyud mtshan yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid 'jug pa'i rgyud mtshan yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is the cause of engaging its own nature.

original: chen po la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni bum pa la sogs pa gzhan du yon tan gzhan zhes bya pa yon tan chen po nyid kyi rgyu mtshan can yin pas phreng ba la sogs pa gang la de med par 'jug na der phal pa yin no //
analyzed: chen po la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni bum pa la sogs pa gzhan du yon tan gzhan zhes bya pa yon tan chen po nyid kyi rgyu mtshan can yin pas phreng ba la sogs pa gang la de med par 'jug na der phal pa yin no //
translated: The convention of “great” and so on is that in other things such as a pot, other qualities called “great” and so on are the reason, and when they engage in a garland and so on that lacks them, they are ordinary.

original: gzhan rung ste zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan med par yang ngo //🔽de dang ni grags pa dang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan rung ste zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan med par yang ngo // de dang ni grags pa dang ngo //
translated: “It is suitable for another” means it is also without a reason.🔽It is similar to what is renowned.

original: mtshungs gang yin pa de la ltos nas so //
analyzed: mtshungs gang yin pa de la ltos nas so //
translated: It is in dependence on that.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni grags pa dngos kyi @168a * //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni grags pa dngos kyi @168a * //
translated: Otherwise, that which is renowned

original: rgyu ma yin na de'i tshe phyin ci log tu zhes bya ba dngos po med pa la 'jug pa'i sgra ni dngos ma yin par 'gyur la bu la sogs pa yod med pa'i sgra 'jug pa ni gtso bo nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu ma yin na de'i tshe phyin ci log tu zhes bya ba dngos po med pa la 'jug pa'i sgra ni dngos ma yin par 'gyur la bu la sogs pa yod med pa'i sgra 'jug pa ni gtso bo nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not the cause, then the term “nonexistent” would be used in the expression “erroneously with respect to that,” and the terms “existent” and “nonexistent” would be used with respect to the son, etc., as if they were the principal things.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni gzhan du rgyu mtshan med pa ni gtso bo la sogs pa med pa la sgra 'jug pa'i nye bar btags pa gang yin pa de'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni gzhan du rgyu mtshan med pa ni gtso bo la sogs pa med pa la sgra 'jug pa'i nye bar btags pa gang yin pa de'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro //
translated: This is clarified in the following: “The reason for the application of the term to the nonexistent, etc., would be the cause of the designation of the nonexistent, etc., as the cause.”

original: de med kyang zhes bya ba rgyu med kyang sgra yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang zhes bya ba rgyu med kyang sgra yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Even though it does not exist” means even though the cause does not exist, the sound exists.

original: gal te rgyu mtshan med par yang dngos po med pa la sogs pa la sgra 'jug mod //
analyzed: gal te rgyu mtshan med par yang dngos po med pa la sogs pa la sgra 'jug mod //
translated: “Even though there is no reason, the sound is applied to the nonexistent, etc.”

original: sgra ni rgyu mtshan gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs na /
analyzed: sgra ni rgyu mtshan gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs na /
translated: “Sound is the effect of the reason” is the doubt.

original: gang zhig gang med kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig gang med kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Even though it does not exist” is the response.

original: ci ste sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni rgyu nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ste sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni rgyu nyid ma yin no //
translated: “The reason for the application of the term is not the cause.”

original: des na rgyu nyid bkag kyang rgyu mtshan ma bkag pa kho na'o zhes dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni /
analyzed: des na rgyu nyid bkag kyang rgyu mtshan ma bkag pa kho na'o zhes dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni /
translated: Therefore, even though the cause itself is refuted, the reason is not refuted.

original: rgyu mtshan ni rgyu yin no zhes bya bas steg /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni rgyu yin no zhes bya bas steg /
translated: The expression “the reason is the cause” is stated in response to this qualm.

original: rgyu mtshan gyi sgras ni rgyu nyid brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gyi sgras ni rgyu nyid brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the word “reason” expresses the cause itself.

original: dper na sde ba sbyor ba dag gi sde ba sbyor gyi dbye ba dpyid kyi thig le dang / pad ma dang phreng ldan ma la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang / sgra'i cha su pa dang // ting nga la sogs pa dang ming dang bzhin dang rkyen sogs pa ste de bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sde ba sbyor ba dag gi sde ba sbyor gyi dbye ba dpyid kyi thig le dang / pad ma dang phreng ldan ma la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang / sgra'i cha su pa dang // ting nga la sogs pa dang ming dang bzhin dang rkyen sogs pa ste de bzhin no //
translated: For example, in the system of the grammarians, the divisions of the grammarians are in the form of the spring drop, the lotus, the garland-bearer, and so on, and the parts of speech are the noun, the verb, and so on, and the nominal suffixes, the verbal suffixes, and so on.

original: 'dis ni 'dod pa la rag las pa nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'dod pa la rag las pa nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows that it depends on what one wants.

original: ldog pa brjod nas rjes su 'gro ba gsungs pa ni ;
analyzed: ldog pa brjod nas rjes su 'gro ba gsungs pa ni ;
translated: Having stated the contrapositive, he states the positive concomitance:

original: 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan med kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan med kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Even though there is no reason for engaging in it.”

original: 'di ma grub pa'i mtha'i smra bas brjod pa ni rgyu mtshan la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ma grub pa'i mtha'i smra bas brjod pa ni rgyu mtshan la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression “even though” is stated by the proponent of the unestablished conclusion.

original: 'dir gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan med na zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'dir gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan med na zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Here, the word “without” is stated.

original: 'di 'gog pa'i ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di 'gog pa'i ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is not a refutation of that.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni rigs med par bram zed don gyed mi nus so zhes bya ba'i gzhal bya 'di la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni rigs med par bram zed don gyed mi nus so zhes bya ba'i gzhal bya 'di la'o //
translated: “In that case” means in regard to this thesis that one who is not a Brahmin is not able to perform the duties of a Brahmin.

original: 'on te rigs tshad ma'i yul ma yin du chug pa de lta yang de bram ze'i don bya ba la nus pa yod pas des de med par de don ji ltar 'gyur zhes brjod pa ni //
analyzed: 'on te rigs tshad ma'i yul ma yin du chug pa de lta yang de bram ze'i don bya ba la nus pa yod pas des de med par de don ji ltar 'gyur zhes brjod pa ni //
translated: Even if it is granted that a Brahmin is not the object of a valid cognition, still, since he has the ability to perform the duties of a Brahmin, how can that be done by one who is not a Brahmin?

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “concomitance” is used.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mthong ba yang nus par rtog pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mthong ba yang nus par rtog pa de'i tshe /
translated: “Otherwise” means that if one imagines that there is ability even when one does not see concomitance and the reverse,

original: phreng ba 'dzin pa la sogs rnam pa ci ltar 'dod par yongs su rdzogs pa nyid re zhig brjod pa ni /
analyzed: phreng ba 'dzin pa la sogs rnam pa ci ltar 'dod par yongs su rdzogs pa nyid re zhig brjod pa ni /
translated: then the complete enumeration of the various types of rosary-bearers, etc., is stated.

original: yi ge'i rim pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yi ge'i rim pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In the case of the order of letters” means in the case of the order of the letters of the alphabet.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te yi ge'i rim pa la de kho nar rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig yod na de'i tshe'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te yi ge'i rim pa la de kho nar rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig yod na de'i tshe'o //
translated: If it were not so, i.e., if the order of the letters were not natural, but were due to some reason, then

original: 'on ti rgyu mtshan de nyid brdas gsal bar byed do zhen ma yin @168b te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on ti rgyu mtshan de nyid brdas gsal bar byed do zhen ma yin @168b te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it would be due to that reason that the convention would be made clear.

original: ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa dngos por gyur ba rtogs pa na brda la mi ltos pa de bzhin du 'di yang brda la mi ltos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa dngos por gyur ba rtogs pa na brda la mi ltos pa de bzhin du 'di yang brda la mi ltos par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the apprehension of things such as form does not depend on a convention, so this would not depend on a convention.

original: rtog pa zhes bya ba ni nyan pa'i rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: rtog pa zhes bya ba ni nyan pa'i rtogs pa ste /
translated: The apprehension is the listener's apprehension.

original: nyan pas ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin la ni //
analyzed: nyan pas ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin la ni //
translated: The nature of what is not apprehended by the listener

original: smra ba pos ka yung brda bya ba mi nus so //
analyzed: smra ba pos ka yung brda bya ba mi nus so //
translated: cannot be indicated by the speaker.

original: de lta'o zhe na ni tha snyad kyi tshe na nyan pa pos mi rtog pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta'o zhe na ni tha snyad kyi tshe na nyan pa pos mi rtog pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were so, then at the time of convention, the listener would not apprehend at all.🔽He explains that:

original: de nyid 'chad pa ni ci srid dngos po mtha' med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'chad pa ni ci srid dngos po mtha' med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: As long as there is no end to things...

original: da ni rang bzhin la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin yin par brjod pa ni /
analyzed: da ni rang bzhin la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin yin par brjod pa ni /
translated: Now, he states that the nature, etc., are as desired:

original: rang bzhin la sogs pa dag ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin la sogs pa dag ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Nature, etc.”

original: 'o na ji ltar yod do zhes bya bal sogs pa 'grub pa ce na 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar yod do zhes bya bal sogs pa 'grub pa ce na 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: “But how is it established that it exists, etc.?” “In this way.”

original: / yang ji ltar na brda rgyu mtshan tha dad pas ma sbyar ce na /
analyzed: / yang ji ltar na brda rgyu mtshan tha dad pas ma sbyar ce na /
translated: “But how is it that the convention is not based on a different reason?”

original: 'dod pa dang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang zhes gsungs so //
translated: “Desire, etc.”

original: gal te spyi med na 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te spyi med na 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “But if there is no universal, how is it that . . . ?”

original: rnam par de ltar bu'i zhes bya ba gcig tu 'dzin pa bskyed par nus pa'i mngon sum mo //
analyzed: rnam par de ltar bu'i zhes bya ba gcig tu 'dzin pa bskyed par nus pa'i mngon sum mo //
translated: “The direct perception that is able to produce the apprehension of a single ‘suchness.’ ”

original: dpe nyid bsgrub par bya ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpe nyid bsgrub par bya ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The example itself is the probandum, pleasure, etc.”

original: de lta bu nyid yin zhes bya ba ni don la brten pa'i bde ba nyid yod pa yin na'o / de lta bum yin pa nyid ni sdug bsngal nyid do //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid yin zhes bya ba ni don la brten pa'i bde ba nyid yod pa yin na'o / de lta bum yin pa nyid ni sdug bsngal nyid do //
translated: “Suchness” means that the object of pleasure exists. “Not suchness” means that the object of pain exists.

original: ji ltar kha dog dang dbyibs kyi phyi rol na yod pas na dus gcig tu rnam par shes pa'i rnam par gnyig gar 'gyur ba de bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar kha dog dang dbyibs kyi phyi rol na yod pas na dus gcig tu rnam par shes pa'i rnam par gnyig gar 'gyur ba de bzhin du //
translated: “Just as color and shape exist externally, and are the objects of a single consciousness, in the same way . . .”

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal phyi rol na yod pas na rnam bar shes pa dus gcig tu gnyi ga'i rnam pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal phyi rol na yod pas na rnam bar shes pa dus gcig tu gnyi ga'i rnam pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Since pleasure and pain exist externally, consciousness would have the aspect of both at the same time.

original: thal ba spong ba brjod pa ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thal ba spong ba brjod pa ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The objection is stated: “Why is this consequence not accepted?”

original: lan ni de lta gyur na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de lta gyur na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is: “If that were so . . .”

original: ma mthong ba kho nas zhes bya ba ni phyir rol na ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag yod pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ma mthong ba kho nas zhes bya ba ni phyir rol na ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag yod pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: “Since they are not seen” means that pleasure and pain do not exist externally.

original: de lta gyur pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de lta gyur pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: “If that were so” means if pleasure and pain were external.

original: ma mthong bas ni yod pa'i dngos po nges par byed kyi //
analyzed: ma mthong bas ni yod pa'i dngos po nges par byed kyi //
translated: “Since they are not seen” means that one ascertains that an existent thing does not exist externally.

original: sgrub par ni ma yin te //
analyzed: sgrub par ni ma yin te //
translated: But one does not establish that it exists internally.🔽“Even though they exist externally” means that pleasure and pain exist externally.🔽“Even though they exist externally, since they are not seen, it is tenable to ascertain that they exist internally.”

original: des la ste phyi rol na bde ba dang sdug bsngal yod pa de lta na yang de dag gi nang na mthong ba'i dbang gis gcig kho na mthong ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma zhes nges par 'thad pa yin na zhes brjod pa ni ma mthong ba ni
analyzed: des la ste phyi rol na bde ba dang sdug bsngal yod pa de lta na yang de dag gi nang na mthong ba'i dbang gis gcig kho na mthong ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma zhes nges par 'thad pa yin na zhes brjod pa ni ma mthong ba ni
translated: “Even though they exist externally, since they are not seen, it is tenable to ascertain that they exist internally.”

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: sgrub pa nyid mchog yin pa nyid brjod pa ni ma mthong bas nges par byed pa na rtog pa du mar 'gyur te //
analyzed: sgrub pa nyid mchog yin pa nyid brjod pa ni ma mthong bas nges par byed pa na rtog pa du mar 'gyur te //
translated: The supreme status of the proof itself is stated: When one ascertains something by means of non-perception, there are many conceptualizations.

original: re zhig phyi rol bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar brtags par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: re zhig phyi rol bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar brtags par bya ba yin la /
translated: First, one should investigate whether external things are pleasant or painful.

original: de las kyang gzhan nges par byed par yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang gzhan nges par byed par yin no //
translated: Then, one should ascertain something else.

original: 'di nyid brjod pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya @169a * //
analyzed: 'di nyid brjod pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya @169a * //
translated: This is stated as follows:

original: ba'o ; ma mthong bas sgrub pa byed par rtogs pa na ma mthong ba 'ba' zhig rtog pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ba'o ; ma mthong bas sgrub pa byed par rtogs pa na ma mthong ba 'ba' zhig rtog pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: When one understands the proof by means of non-perception, one conceptualizes only non-perception, not anything else.

original: 'dzin pa de rjes su 'gro ba nyid las spyi'i don rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa 'grub kyi spyi'i dbang gis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dzin pa de rjes su 'gro ba nyid las spyi'i don rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa 'grub kyi spyi'i dbang gis ni ma yin no //
translated: The establishment of inference of a universal, etc. is due to the conformity of that apprehension, not due to the universal itself.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar 'du ba'i dbang gis gcig tu rtogs pa mi 'thad pa de'i phyir na spyi de rtogs pa gang yin pa de la nus pa med do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar 'du ba'i dbang gis gcig tu rtogs pa mi 'thad pa de'i phyir na spyi de rtogs pa gang yin pa de la nus pa med do //
translated: Since it is not tenable that the cognition of a universal is due to the power of a universal, therefore that cognition of a universal is not capable of establishing a universal.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i nus pa med pa nang gi byed pa la rag las pa de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i nus pa med pa nang gi byed pa la rag las pa de bzhin du'o //
translated: Likewise means that just as the absence of the capacity for understanding depends on an internal agent, so too.

original: rigs zhes bya ba yang shes pa nyid la brjod de //
analyzed: rigs zhes bya ba yang shes pa nyid la brjod de //
translated: The word type also refers to consciousness.

original: des na rigs gzhan khas blangs ba mi rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rigs gzhan khas blangs ba mi rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not unreasonable to accept another type.

original: 'o na ji ltar thams cad la ba lang ba lang zhes bya ba'i sge rjes su 'gro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar thams cad la ba lang ba lang zhes bya ba'i sge rjes su 'gro zhe na /
translated: But how is it that cow is a universal for all cows?

original: lhag ma ni zhes gsungs te //
analyzed: lhag ma ni zhes gsungs te //
translated: The remainder, he says, .

original: gang la 'bras bu tha mi dad par zhen pa yod pa ba lang la sogs pa de dag gi dngos po nyid de des so //
analyzed: gang la 'bras bu tha mi dad par zhen pa yod pa ba lang la sogs pa de dag gi dngos po nyid de des so //
translated: That is, those things such as cows that are conceived of as having undifferentiated effects are just entities, and by that.

original: ci ste yang rang gi ngo bo las tha dad par de'i 'bras bu can gyi spyi yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang rang gi ngo bo las tha dad par de'i 'bras bu can gyi spyi yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if a universal that has that as its effect exists separately from its own nature, then what?

original: 'di la brjod pa ni de lta na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni de lta na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is, In that case, . . ..

original: cig tu rtogs par zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: cig tu rtogs par zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The word only means.

original: sa bon la sogs pa yang 'di ni zhing ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa yang 'di ni zhing ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even seeds, etc., would be fields.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The response is: “No, it is not so.”

original: ji ltar ba lang gi gsal ba rnams la de'i 'bras bu can nyid khyi dbang gis ba lang ba lang zhes rtogs pa de bzhin du zhing la sogs pa rnams la yang de'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi dbang gis sa bon sa bon zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro
analyzed: ji ltar ba lang gi gsal ba rnams la de'i 'bras bu can nyid khyi dbang gis ba lang ba lang zhes rtogs pa de bzhin du zhing la sogs pa rnams la yang de'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi dbang gis sa bon sa bon zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro
translated: Just as the individual cows are understood as cows by virtue of their being the effects of the universal cow, in the same way, the individual fields, etc., are understood as seeds by virtue of their being the effects of the seed.

original: // 'gyur ba yang ma yin te //
analyzed: // 'gyur ba yang ma yin te //
translated: Nor is it the case that they are not so.

original: des na de'i 'bras can nyid ces bya ba'i si tha dad pa na tha dad par rtogs pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de'i 'bras can nyid ces bya ba'i si tha dad pa na tha dad par rtogs pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the difference in being the effect of that is not the cause of the difference in understanding.

original: spyi yod dam 'on te med ces bya ba la sogs pa'ang der dub ba ste nyon mongs pa de ni dgos pa med do //
analyzed: spyi yod dam 'on te med ces bya ba la sogs pa'ang der dub ba ste nyon mongs pa de ni dgos pa med do //
translated: The question, “Does the universal exist or not?” etc., is also pointless, because it is a source of fatigue and trouble.

original: 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa ni yod pa yin //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa ni yod pa yin //
translated: The reason for the engagement is the engagement itself.

original: de nyid rgyu mtshan yin te 'bras bu gcig pa de nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid rgyu mtshan yin te 'bras bu gcig pa de nyid do //
translated: That is the reason, the single effect.

original: de dang ldan pa ni rab tu bcug pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa ni rab tu bcug pa'o //
translated: That which possesses that is fully engaged.

original: rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid du ji ltar mi 'thad ce na //
analyzed: rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid du ji ltar mi 'thad ce na //
translated: How is it not tenable that it has an aspect?

original: ma 'dres pa la ste /
analyzed: ma 'dres pa la ste /
translated: It is in the undifferentiated.

original: gzhan las ldog pa la ni rnam pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa la ni rnam pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: In the opposite of the other, because it is without an aspect,

original: rang bzhin can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not natural.

original: de las gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni nges pa kho nang rnam par dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni nges pa kho nang rnam par dang ldan pa'o //
translated: From that, the other, it is definitely only with an aspect.

original: blo dang 'brel ba yin na 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: blo dang 'brel ba yin na 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is connected with the mind, not otherwise.

original: 'dis ni re zhig blo'i rnam pa gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ba nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni re zhig blo'i rnam pa gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ba nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows that the aspect of the mind must be accepted without doubt.

original: 'di ltar @169b yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na //
analyzed: 'di ltar @169b yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na //
translated: Why is it like this?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is how it is.

original: gal te de ltar ji srid blo thog ma med pa'i bag chags dang 'brel bar khas len na blo der snang ba'i rgyu ni ci nyid yin par khas blang bar bya'o snyam na 'di la ba la ngo snyam pa'i yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni
analyzed: gal te de ltar ji srid blo thog ma med pa'i bag chags dang 'brel bar khas len na blo der snang ba'i rgyu ni ci nyid yin par khas blang bar bya'o snyam na 'di la ba la ngo snyam pa'i yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni
translated: If one accepts that the mind is connected with beginningless predispositions in this way, then one should accept that the cause of the appearance of that mind is what?

original: gzhal bya snang ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhal bya snang ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: The object of cognition is not the appearance.

original: spyi mi snang mod de de lta na yang de yul du ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: spyi mi snang mod de de lta na yang de yul du ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Although the universal does not appear, how can it not be the object of that?🔽The form of the object.

original: gzhal bya'i rnam par zhes bya ba'o //🔽de dang ni bag chags dang ngo //
analyzed: gzhal bya'i rnam par zhes bya ba'o // de dang ni bag chags dang ngo //
translated: It is the latent impression.

original: de nyid la mi slu bar zhes bya ba ni bag chags gnyid la mi slu bar ro //
analyzed: de nyid la mi slu bar zhes bya ba ni bag chags gnyid la mi slu bar ro //
translated: It is not deceptive with regard to that, i.e., the latent impression is not deceptive with regard to sleep.

original: de'i 'bras bu med pa las ldog pa yongs su gcog mod //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu med pa las ldog pa yongs su gcog mod //
translated: The result of that is the cessation of the absence of external objects.

original: ci skyon snyam na //
analyzed: ci skyon snyam na //
translated: What is the problem?

original: de'i 'bras bu can nyid de yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu can nyid de yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That is the result of that, i.e., the cessation of the absence of external objects.

original: ldog pa yang ngo //
analyzed: ldog pa yang ngo //
translated: It is the cessation.

original: yang na phyi rol gyi rang bzhin gyi ldog pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: yang na phyi rol gyi rang bzhin gyi ldog pa nyid yin no //
translated: Or, it is the cessation of the external nature.

original: 'dis ni ldog pa yongs su gcod pa na phyi rol gyi rang bzhin yongs su gcad par bstan pa yin no //🔽de zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i rang bzhin nam /
analyzed: 'dis ni ldog pa yongs su gcod pa na phyi rol gyi rang bzhin yongs su gcad par bstan pa yin no // de zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i rang bzhin nam /
translated: This shows that when the cessation is determined, the external nature is determined.🔽That, i.e., the external nature that is the nature of the affirmation,

original: ldog pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyi rol gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ldog pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyi rol gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: or the external nature that is the nature of the cessation.

original: gal te phyi rol gyi mthar thug pa yin na de'i tshe phyi rol la reg par ci ste mi 'gyur snyam na //
analyzed: gal te phyi rol gyi mthar thug pa yin na de'i tshe phyi rol la reg par ci ste mi 'gyur snyam na //
translated: If it is the external limit, then why does it not touch the external?

original: brgyud pas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: brgyud pas zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said, “indirectly.”

original: de dang tha mi dang pa'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de dang tha mi dang pa'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: “Not different from that” means the nature of the conceptual image.

original: gtan tshigs gnyis pa ni gzhan las ldog pa dag la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis pa ni gzhan las ldog pa dag la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The second reason is “in the case of the reversal from the other.”

original: 'di gnyis gsal bar byed pa ni phyi rol la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di gnyis gsal bar byed pa ni phyi rol la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: These two are clarified by “external” and so on.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba'o //
translated: “That” means the conceptual object.

original: de las gzhan zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: de las gzhan zhes bya ba ni //
translated: “Other than that” means

original: tha dad par snang ba las gzhan no //
analyzed: tha dad par snang ba las gzhan no //
translated: different from the appearance.

original: 'gal ba ci yod ces bya ba ni kha dog dbang dbyings su snang ba dang ldan pa rnam par rtog pa la snang ba gal te dngos po yin mod /
analyzed: 'gal ba ci yod ces bya ba ni kha dog dbang dbyings su snang ba dang ldan pa rnam par rtog pa la snang ba gal te dngos po yin mod /
translated: “What is the contradiction?” means that if the appearance of color, shape, and so on in the conceptual consciousness is a thing,

original: de'i tshe ci 'gal zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: de'i tshe ci 'gal zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: then what is the contradiction? This is the meaning.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the statement is “because.”

original: rnam par rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan phyi rol gyi dngos po ma yin mod //
analyzed: rnam par rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan phyi rol gyi dngos po ma yin mod //
translated: The reflection of conceptualization is not an external thing.

original: blo'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po yin pas de nyid sgra dag gi brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni de lta yin mod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: blo'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po yin pas de nyid sgra dag gi brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni de lta yin mod ces bya ba'o //
translated: Since the characteristic of cognition is a thing, it is the referent of words.

original: sgra'i don gzhan sel ba ma gtogs pas gzhan dag brjod pa ni 'o na ni gzhan sel ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra'i don gzhan sel ba ma gtogs pas gzhan dag brjod pa ni 'o na ni gzhan sel ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say that the referent of a word is the exclusion of another, then the exclusion of another is also a referent of a word.

original: de yin na zhes bya ba ni blo'i rna pa yin na'o //
analyzed: de yin na zhes bya ba ni blo'i rna pa yin na'o //
translated: If it is a cognition,

original: de zhes bya ba ni blo'i rnam par sgra las rtogs pa na'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni blo'i rnam par sgra las rtogs pa na'o //
translated: then it is understood from a word as a mental aspect.

original: mi 'gyur mod kyi ci skyon snyam na gzhan sel ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur mod kyi ci skyon snyam na gzhan sel ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not so, then what is the problem?

original: gzhan sel ba ni don gyi cha nyid do zhes bya bar yang ji @170a * //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba ni don gyi cha nyid do zhes bya bar yang ji @170a * //
translated: The exclusion of another is a part of the referent.

original: ltar shes snyam na sgras zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ltar shes snyam na sgras zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is that known?

original: 'on te blo'i rnam pa nyid ni don la yang yod de des na de la don gyi cha nyid kyang mnyams par yod do zhe na //
analyzed: 'on te blo'i rnam pa nyid ni don la yang yod de des na de la don gyi cha nyid kyang mnyams par yod do zhe na //
translated: If the aspect of cognition exists in the referent, then the part of the referent also exists in it.🔽If the aspect of cognition exists in the referent, then the part of the referent also exists in it.

original: rnam pa de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That form is also.

original: de'ang zhes bya ba ni blo'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de'ang zhes bya ba ni blo'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: And also means the characteristic of the form of cognition.

original: blo nyid bzhin no zhes bya ba ni mthong ba bzhin no //
analyzed: blo nyid bzhin no zhes bya ba ni mthong ba bzhin no //
translated: Like cognition itself means like the seeing.

original: dper na mthong ba rjes su 'gro ba med pa de bzhin du blo'i rnam pa yang yin no //
analyzed: dper na mthong ba rjes su 'gro ba med pa de bzhin du blo'i rnam pa yang yin no //
translated: Just as seeing is not followed, so also is the form of cognition.

original: 'on te 'di rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i mthong bas bskyed pa de de lta na yang rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no snyam na //
analyzed: 'on te 'di rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i mthong bas bskyed pa de de lta na yang rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no snyam na //
translated: But if it is generated by seeing that is not followed, then in that case it would be followed.

original: rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said that it is not followed.

original: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni blo'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni blo'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The form of cognition is called a reflection.

original: dngos po ni zhes bya ba ni phyi rol lo //
analyzed: dngos po ni zhes bya ba ni phyi rol lo //
translated: The thing is the external object.

original: spyi rtogs pa med pa nyid gsal bar byed pa'i dngos po la brten pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi rtogs pa med pa nyid gsal bar byed pa'i dngos po la brten pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The thing that is the basis of the manifestation of the nonapprehension of the universal is.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i dngos po cha'i rang bzhin du gyur ba'i gzhan sel ba mi rtogs la //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i dngos po cha'i rang bzhin du gyur ba'i gzhan sel ba mi rtogs la //
translated: That means the thing that is apprehended is not apprehended as the exclusion of other that has the nature of a part.

original: gzhan sel ba'i dngos po cha'i rang bzhin du yang khyod kyis brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba'i dngos po cha'i rang bzhin du yang khyod kyis brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: You also say that it is the nature of the entity that is the exclusion of another.

original: lan ni 'di la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni 'di la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “In this regard.”

original: blo'i rnam pa la dngos po'o snyam du sgro 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: blo'i rnam pa la dngos po'o snyam du sgro 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na //
translated: How can there be the superimposition that the aspect of the awareness is an entity?

original: de dang gcig tu zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de dang gcig tu zhes gsungs so //
translated: “ It is conceived as one with that.”

original: dngos po dang blo'i rnam pa gcig tu zhen nas so //
analyzed: dngos po dang blo'i rnam pa gcig tu zhen nas so //
translated: It is conceived as one with the entity and the aspect of the awareness.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni blo'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni blo'i rang bzhin no //
translated: “ That” is the nature of the awareness.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni thams cad la rtogs pa'i phyir dang dngos po dang lhan cig tu byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni thams cad la rtogs pa'i phyir dang dngos po dang lhan cig tu byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Its” refers to the fact that it is realized in all things and is produced in conjunction with the entity.

original: 'o na ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can du'ang 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can du'ang 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: “ But then it is not tenable that it has the exclusion of another as its object,

original: log par snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na //
analyzed: log par snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na //
translated: because it appears erroneously.”

original: gzhan sel ba ni bden pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba ni bden pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: “ The exclusion of another is true.”

original: ji ltar bden snyam na dngos po rnam pa ltar zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ji ltar bden snyam na dngos po rnam pa ltar zhes gsungs te /
translated: How is it true? “ It is like the entity.”

original: dper na dngos po'i rnam par bya ba yin pa la gdon pa yod pa de bzhin du gzhan sel ba de la ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na dngos po'i rnam par bya ba yin pa la gdon pa yod pa de bzhin du gzhan sel ba de la ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: For example, in the case of the activity of an entity, there is an exclusion of what is not that entity.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'di ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'di ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is clarified by “this” .

original: 'dis ni gnod pa'i rnam pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni gnod pa'i rnam pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: This expresses the form of contradiction.

original: gang la gnod pa byed pa yod pa ni de ma yin no //
analyzed: gang la gnod pa byed pa yod pa ni de ma yin no //
translated: That which is contradicted is not that .

original: gal te gnod byed yod pa dang med pa dag gis ma rtogs pa dang / rtogs par gzhag pa ni mi 'thad de snang ba yod pa dang med pa dag kho nas rnam par gzhag par rigs pa'i phyir ro snyam na de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te gnod byed yod pa dang med pa dag gis ma rtogs pa dang / rtogs par gzhag pa ni mi 'thad de snang ba yod pa dang med pa dag kho nas rnam par gzhag par rigs pa'i phyir ro snyam na de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is thought that it is not tenable to posit non-apprehension and apprehension by means of the existent and the non-existent contradictories, because it is reasonable to posit them by means of the existent and non-existent appearances alone, then the response is “because . . .

original: cig shos zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: cig shos zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: ” “The other” is the conceptualization of an entity.

original: 'gro ba yin no zhes bya ba rtogs pa yin te nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba yin no zhes bya ba rtogs pa yin te nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “It is a goer” is the apprehension, i.e., the ascertainment, of that.

original: gzhan sel ba de @170b la skyes bu 'jug par byed pa yang yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba de @170b la skyes bu 'jug par byed pa yang yin no //
